Summary: We (couple in our 30s) stayed in September 2022. We had a city view room. Overall, the room was clean and seemed updated. We didn't have an issue with noise. The in-room mini fridge and microwave were convenient. We never had a problem finding parking. The breakfast was lacking (only protein was scrambled eggs and sausage patty. I would have liked to see peanut butter or yogurt) but it was free, so I can't really complain. We did not use the pool, so we can't comment on that. We used Uber for Disneyland and then walked back from the toy story parking lot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just recently stayed 4 nights in April 2022. This was our second stay and we love it at this hotel. First, there is a Starbucks and many other places to eat right across the street. It is also within close walking distance of the Anaheim GardenWalk outdoor mall, which is unique and sort of a hidden gem. There is a large hot tub/whirlpool at this hotel along with the large outdoor pool (both have been completely empty-no other guests using them-during both times we stayed here). Pool towels are provided. They have brought their breakfast buffet back after Covid closure! Nice choices. The best part that I love about this hotel is that it ALWAYS smells clean, almost like they mop all the floors multiple times a day. The only downside is that it is quite a walk from the Disney
Room tip: The rooms facing the freeway were VERY loud, from traffic noise.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for 8 nights while visiting family and overall had a good experience.  Pros: - The hotel is convenient to many area restaurants, shopping and a Disney lot that     provides shuttle service to and from the parks.  - Large, welcoming lobby with friendly, helpful staff - Complimentary breakfast each morning, including scrambled eggs, sausage, waffle    maker, hot drinks, juices and pre-packaged pastries - I had a king bed room, which was very spacious with large bathroom, mini fridge,    microwave and small coffeemaker. - Room was clean and fresh smelling, towels and linens were clean and bed was    comfortable. Cons: - Hotel is situated directly beside a very busy on/off ramp for the 5 Freeway. Very convenient to hop on/off if you are using the 5 during your stay, but
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Comfort Inn was very convenient for our Disneyland trip Oct 2022.  When we arrived around noon our room was ready a very pleasant surprise.  We asked for rooms close together we were a family and couldn't all fit in one room. They said they would do the best , well they did we had a joining rooms.  This was perfect.  Rooms were clean and comfortable.  The breakfast that was included was really good.  Eggs, sausage patties, waffles, bread for toast.  Only wished for bagels.  Hotel was pretty quiet, you can hear street noise but not a lot of people noises.  Several places to eat in the area, about a 2 block walk to the Disneyland Toy Story parking lot.  Very convenient to use for the buses to get to the park.  Everyone that worked here was very friendly.  Would recommend
Room tip: Maybe ask for a room towards the back and away from the interstate if possible
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location but rude front desk employee
Summary: Great location. I stayed 3 nights on family visiting trip. I booked for 3 nights but they said that I have only two nights booking. They extended one extra night and did not honor the same rate of previous nights. I was charged the higher rate than the previous nights. The front desk lady working in 2nd shift was very rude and arguing rather than listening the issue. She wasn't polite and keep arguing and finally the person working with her told her to calm down.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was clean, beds comfy, staff was great.  We were on the freeway side ((RIGHT next to the freeway)- we were so tired after days at Disney, we turned on the fan to the a/c, closed the curtains and crashed.  Breakfast was meh because it was the same  few items with the highlight being waffles.  There is a Disney parking lot a block to the west of the hotel which saved us at the end of the day and an Uber is about $7 each way.
Room tip: If you can, stay on the side opposite of the freeway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel served a grab and go breakfast, which in principle was fine.  The issue was that every day we had the same thing, a sausage and egg sandwich and a muffin.  After 3 days this was tiresome and needed to be mixed up a bit.   Parking was easy, the room was spacious and  clean.  The staff were friendly and helpful.   This hotel is close enough to Disney that we were able to Uber to the park gate, avoiding the long walk form Disney parking lot to the gate   (as the trams were not running)  even with a tip both ways, Uber was less expensive than Disney parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business.

Summary: Went to Disneyland 2 days. We walked the mile there. No shuttle. 1 day at the beach.   The lady who has been doing her job for 15 years at the front desk was so nice and friendly! She needs a raise! All who worked there were very great!  Spa is very big and pool was good.   Hotel rooms are tiny! Needs new carpet. Feels old and worn out. We stayed for 4 nights with 2 rooms. There was 9 of us. Rooms so small it’s hard to move around. Liked the beds and bedding. Had an infant port a crib and there was no place for it in the room that wasn’t squished to get around.  Tried to get out of the 4th night but didn’t ask 48 hours a head so couldn’t get a refund.  Wanted to get a nicer room to celebrate my daughters birthday in.   Breakfast was so disappointing. After 2 mornings of jimmy
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here 4 nights. The hotel is outdated and in desperate need of remodeling. The room wasn't very clean, the window was out of square with the frame, so it did not shut. We stayed in room 508 (east side of the building and next to the freeway entrance) and you could hear every car go by. There were some homeless people hanging out in the parking lot which made us nervous about the security of our vehicle. The room was outdated, the furniture looked old, and the mattress on the bed was worn. The mattress had a high mound in the middle and sunk in on both sides. Extremely uncomfortable! The staff was friendly, and the grab and go breakfast was mediocre (old muffin and a Jimmy Dean breakfast sandwich). The coffee was weak. We will never be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Don't let the outside appearance fool u!
Summary: The outside of the hotels need some paint and tlc, but the neighborhood is safe  and the inside of the hotel is very clean and friendly staff  Note the even numberered rooms face the freeway and the on ramp  and can be a little noisy but not excessively so
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay at this hotel on about half of our Family Disneyland trips. This time was very different, but still a good hotel. As of April 3rd, 2021 the pool, business center etc were not open. We had hoped the pool would have been opened for the kids, but we understand. Breakfast left some to be desired, we got a paper bag with a muffin, a Jimmy Dean breakfast sandwich, and a bottle of water. Lastly, the last morning of our trip we got all packed and then our car wouldn’t start. Jennifer at the front desk was super helpful with getting our car started. She used her own car jump battery to help us out. Service the whole trip was great, but Jennifer went the extra mile. We will stay here again when the great breakfast comes back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We called the Cambria hotel, right across the street from Comfort Inn, to book a night specifically to use their pool and water park. We were told by reservations that Cambria didn't have any rooms, but that we could book at Comfort Inn, and use the pool at Cambria with a day pass. Day pass wold be valid for a 2 hour slot, and would cost $5 for adults and $2 for kids. We were told to make a pool reservation with our Comfort Inn front desk. At check in, I tried to do so, and they laughed and said no such thing was available. I tried again in the morning, and they said the same, and that multiple customers have also asked the same. I walked across the street to Cambria and they confirmed the same.  Hotel also did not have the advertised breakfast. Stay was ok, but kids were
Manager Response: Dear  Vanessa,   I am sorry for the misunderstanding and false information that Choice representative provided for you, and yes indeed as my staff inform you upon check-in that what you were asking for, was not provided by us since Comfort Inn and Cambrai are two separate Hotels. Again we apologized for any inconvenience that might have caused     We were happy that over all you had a pleasant stay and we look forward to host you in the near future.

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful and the room was fine. Clean enough but a little outdated. The breakfast was plain awful. Calling it a buffet is a stretch. Same sausage patties and powdered eggs every morning. They ran out of hard boiled eggs by 7 and would not bring more out when I asked. Pool was clean. Hot tub was warm not hot. Location not great. If you don’t mind walking by several different groups of homeless people, some fine, some high as a kite and yelling... all to and from the Disney shuttle then by all means, this is the place for you. I’d be nervous with small kids walking by that every night after dark. Fix the breakfast and the gauntlet of street people (not the hotels fault) and it’s decent.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Two things you should know about me: I spend about 30 nights a year in hotels and I live in NYC, which isn’t exactly known for its quiet nights. This hotel, which is located on top of a busy freeway off-ramp, was so noisy that after trying everything, including noise cancelling headphones set to white noise, I finally went downstairs to complain at 4 am and ask for another room.   In all of my years of staying in hotels in many different places, I have never found anything worth complaining about at 4 am. But the constant screech of trucks exiting the freeway made it impossible to sleep! What’s worse was that after complaining both in the middle of the night and then the next morning, the entire hotel staff was indifferent. I followed up with an email to the general manager that
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very good hotel with a view of the free-way!
Summary: I had a very brief stay here for about 8 hour. Have no complains whatsoever. I enjoyed the stay here. 1) Room was very spacious with all necessary and essential amenities. 2)The hotel had few eateries around and a grocery store. 3) My room had a great view of the free way and was very pleasing. 4) The room was very quiet and calm. Had a good sleep.  I was happy on the whole!
Manager Response: Dear SentilS,   Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We very much appreciate and value your feedback and will share it with our team. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one. Summary: Stayed one night at the Comfort Inn Anaheim Resort and it was better than I expected. Really comfy bed, free breakfast, good location. I would stay here again when in the area and would recommend to others.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   I have shared your comments with my staff, and they join me in thanking you for your kind words.  We take pride in our hotel and the services we provide and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay.  We are looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations and service the next time you are in town.  Kind regards, Farzana Kakar General Manager Comfort Inn & Suites 714-772-8713

Summary: I loved staying at this hotel. The room was very clean and beds were really comfortable. The staff was awesome! We made a mistake when booking our hotel and Maria was so nice and was so willing to help. I then had the pleasure of meeting Maria in person and she is so nice and polite. I also visited the front desk several times with questions and everyone was so friendly and polite and always greeting with a smile. Thank you. I hope management really appreciates their staff because they are a great representation of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for taking the time to fill out our online survey with such positive feedback!  I have shared your comments with Maria, and she joins me in thanking you for your kind words.  We take pride in our hotel and the services we provide and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay.  We are looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations and service the next time you are in town.  Kind regards,  Farzana Kakar General Manager Comfort Inn & Suites 714-772-8713

Summary Heading: Loaded at T-giving time with Disney visitors
Summary: We arrived on the Wed night before Thanksgiving and our room was ready for us. First floor handicapped accessible. Room was fine. Parking lot was packed but we did find a handicapped space near the side door. Rooms look exactly like they are pictured on the website -- Breakfast on Thanksgiving. Only one person handling hundreds of folks, the food was not replenished quickly and the tables were cleaned only if you did it yourself. The hotel was full to the gills and lots of kids as you can imagine. There was a real shortage of food and no forks - you will have to eat your eggs with a spoon.  Decaf coffee was out in both pots and the one in the breakfast are for hot water was out also and very little - just enough for a cup of tea in the hall area.  Friday- NO FOOD - cereal with
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a good location
Summary: If you are happy and able to walk the 20 minutes it takes to get to Disneyland, then this is a good hotel to consider. The rooms are a reasonable size and quiet. There is a coffee maker, fridge and microwave in the room and a decent range of channels on the flatscreen TV. The room was clean and the bed comfortable. Breakfast was good and although we didn’t get to try it, the pool looked nice. Parking was free, not all hotels near Disney do that. I think the only downside (and it’s something we find in a lot of hotels) was storage space. In theory, the room could take four people as it had two queen beds, but the ONLY storage space for clothes was three small wire baskets in a cupboard below the TV. There was a lot of space where a decent sized chest of drawers could go, so be
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We very much appreciate and value your feedback and will share it with our team. Summary Heading: Great Stay would consider it again-
Summary: We have family in the Orange County area, so we literally had other options. The price was right and the location was as well, so we booked it to lighten the burden on Family in Garden Grove. The building and rooms were clean, staff was helpful and polite, even allowing us (as posted online) to store our bags at counter for the day while at D-Land. We took Uber daily from the Hotel, found it convenient, as the do not have a shuttle. Staff kept breakfast buffet stocked nicely even with the large groups sifting through it the 3 days we stayed. I read other reviews complaining of being at the on-ramp. Honestly, we faced the on-ramp and it was not an issue and we came from our country home. If faced with another stay, this place would be one of our first considerations!
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We very much appreciate and value your feedback and will share it with our team.  Your survey responses will serve as encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services to provide an exceptional experience for our guests.  It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely,  Farzana Kakar General Manager Comfort Inn & Suites 714-772-8713

Summary Heading: Great Value & very nice place with awesome staff
Summary: This Comfort Inn is a very comfortable place to stay. Besides the bed being awesome, it has great accessibility to the highway, shopping and Disneyland! The staff were very accommodating and efficient. The only thing I would say could use some improvement was to change the breakfast menu up a little. I was there for 3 breakfasts and it was the same sausage and scrambled eggs each morning. Also, the coffee that was in the rooms was not good coffee (to me anyway) I would definitely go back if I was in Anaheim again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   I have shared your comments with my staff, and they join me in thanking you for your kind words.  We take pride in our hotel and the services we provide and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay.  We are looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations and service the next time you are in town.  Kind regards,  Farzana Kakar General Manager Comfort Inn & Suites 714-772-8713

Summary Heading: Good Value - One of the Nicest of Comfort Inn Style Places
Summary: I have experience staying at Choice Hotel-level hotels -- Quality Inns, Travelodges, Comfort Inns, and this is one of the cleanest, nicest Quality Inns I've experienced, a cut above the rest and a good value. Again, not luxury at all - very nice for this level of hotel. They have the usual average continental breakfast fare, nothing special, but mainly it's a VERY CLEAN and COMFORTABLE hotel that's a good value considering the area.   We were on the third floor and found it to be very quiet. I have a feeling rooms on the ground floor are a bit noisier, with all the activity with the business center, fitness center, breakfast area and just general excitement of kids coming back from Disney. Still, the hotel is far enough from the park that it's not ALL Disney folks. A lovely
Manager Response: Hello Joe,  Thank you for choosing our hotel. We are very pleased to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to host you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: Excellent hotel! Very clean and safe. The breakfast was good and the room was spacious. The front desk people were very helpful, and the staff was very friendly. Close to Disneyland with either parking at Toy Story lot and taking a quick shuttle, or taking an Uber.  There are many food options nearby.  Will stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We love receiving feedback from you about your stay here with us. We were happy to read that you were able to enjoyed the many restaurants within walking distance as well as our staff friendliness. Hope you had a great vacation! Looking forward to your return.

Summary: Nice and tidy place, good size room and bathroom. Quite close to freeways so heard the traffic day and night.  Reception staff not that talkative, but still helpful.  Breakfast was okay, not much variety, if you want more than jam for the toast there wasn't even peanut butter etc.
Manager Response: Dear Hurleys2000  We loved receiving feedback from you about your stay with us. We were so glad to read that you found our rooms to be excellent. Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn; we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: Frustrating check in process, over 40 minute wait. They really need to have more than one person working the front desk especially when large groups are checking in to the hotel. Shower was leaking and rusted. Room was noisy due to loud icemaker nearby. We were in our room for an hour and a half, were given a notice that room cannot be cleaned after 4 PM, they should of cleaned our room when we were gone the 6 hours prior. When we asked them to clean our room they declined and were told they were understaffed. Not going back to this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not the best option for Disneyland
Summary: I chose this hotel because I have always had good experiences with Comfort Inns, it was close to Disneyland, and the price was right. The hotel was a little dated, but our room was clean and comfortable. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The downside was the location in relation to Disneyland. While the distance was fine, the neighborhood was not as safe as I would have liked. We had a pretty scary walk heading back to the hotel at the end of the day. Would definitely have been worth the extra money to stay even a block or 2 closer to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for continuing choosing Comfort Inn. We appreciate what you have shared regarding our friendly staff, and cleanliness of our rooms. Om behalf of our entire team, we thank you for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights with the primary focus of our trip being a visit to Disneyland. It was a quick uber ride back and forth to the park. Clean room with comfortable bed. Breakfast room had a nice selection with protein (scrambled eggs, boiled eggs and sausage both days we were there). Got our Disney tickets at the front desk which was super easy. Lots of seating for breakfast. Would stay again.
Manager Response: We very much appreciate and value your feedback and will share it with our team. Your survey responses will serve as encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services to provide an exceptional experience for our guests. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.   Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.

Summary Heading: This was our second stay at this property
Summary: My spouse and I recently spent four nights at the Comfort Inn on Katella Ave. in Anaheim.  We first stayed at this property two years ago and liked it well enough to return for a second visit.  The phone and front desk staff is not the friendliest we've encountered during our numerous visits to Choice Hotel properties.  They did not greet us warmly nor acknowledge our Gold membership status in any way.  However, the room was spacious, comfortable and clean, which is what we are looking for in a hotel.  The breakfast is fairly standard and the choices do not change from one day to another, but it is sufficient.  The breakfast staff is very good at keeping everything well-stocked and the area clean.  We had a good Internet connection throughout our stay.  The location of this
Manager Response: none

Summary: Initially I booked 2 rooms for 2 nights, upon check in request to cancel 1 room for both nights, Front Desk lady advise me that she cancelled booking for 1 rooms for 2 nights, but still Hotel charge me for 1 night and now not refunding my money. So please guys be aware if you decided to stay there.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very good hotel with minor flaws.
Summary: I've stayed her a couple of times with my family and haven't had a major complaint against this hotel. It's very quiet even though it's on a busy street. The rooms are cozy but stuffy at times. Breakfast is decent, but felt that they need to mix it up a bit (maybe add bacon or potatoes to the buffet?). No on-site laundry, but it's close to a coin-op laundry next door (being single dollar bills or quarters!). No shuttle but Lyft to and from Disneyland is about $7 per ride. The internet had a decent speed and connectivity. There was PLENTY of parking; although, I felt the the hotel was not completely booked. Overall, there is some room for improvement but it was a very good stay with my family.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel has an unwelcoming vibe the minute you check-in to your room. You're greeted with a sign that states if anything is missing from the room you'll be charged for it! After our stay, I was contacted by the hotel to leave feedback. I gave my honest opinion of their newly remodeled rooms that was less than positive. Instead of addressing my feedback professionally, I received a rude email from the general manager "Farzana" implying I should be greatfull they let us back in our room when we got locked out. Stating it was above and beyond their call of duty. Really? I guess we should be greatfull they didn't make us sleep in the hallway. If you want hospitality, I would recommend another hotel that is run by professional management.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great Hotel if you don’t mind all the NOISE  Pros:  I chose this hotel based on price and reviews.  The hotel was clean and modern. Check-in was fast, friendly, and efficient.  The area was safe - we walked the 1.3 miles to and from Disney most times.  An Uber was $8 to cut off the first 1 mile.  The breakfast was standard continental - eggs, sausage, breads, waffles, cereal, and fruit.  Everything was clean and in working order in our room.  The beds were very comfortable.  Cons:  There is NO soundproofing to the outside.  I paid the extra to stay on the “quiet side”.  If that was quiet, I can’t imagine how loud the freeway side is.  There was a lot of construction in the area the week were there.  You hear every beep of the trucks all night long, the cars on the road in front
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Mostly good with a few big issues.
Summary: Stayed here for a convention for 5 days.  Pros: Good price Good location Comfy beds Remodel was done pretty well - feels updated and modern  Cons: Very little water pressure in shower Sparse selection at breakfast - OK for a night or two but gets old after 5 nights VERY loud AC units - like a 747 taking off every time it kicked it.  Next time I'm in town I'll search elsewhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very happy with our stay in this clean and perfectly located hotel. Do not forget to ask the concierge about discounts in and near the parks. We experienced the best support for making our Disney vacation affordable and welcoming. Thanks to the super staff and their expertise with the town.
Manager Response: Dear Hopperkieth,   Thank you for taking the time to fill out our online survey with such positive feedback! I have shared your comments with my staff, and they join me in thanking you for your kind words. We take pride in our hotel and the services we provide and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay.   We are looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations and service the next time you are in town.   Kind regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel for price visiting Dosneyland
Summary: Did a ton of research before our visit to Disneyland. Usually one would stay at far worse hotels for this price (below $90) around Disneyland. Only complaint is that the breakfast was very bear and easy to get sick of.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for your review, we are please to serve you and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Very very clean and best pool
Summary: Affordable and impecably clean hotel. The pool was perfect and we will be back. It close to Disneyland so this a great place for families. Breakfast was good and staff was always cleaning. Close to all the locate restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We love receiving feedback from you about your stay here with us. We were so glad to read that you found our property clean and were able to enjoy our pool. Thank you for your visit, hope you had a great vacation and had safe travels home.

Summary: We loved this hotel. Clean.with comfortable bed. Hot shower with great shower head. Good price. Spacious king rm Friendly informative staff. No shuttle but taxi from Disney <$10 before tip. Disneyland only about 4 blocks away long walk after all day walking. Basic Belfast could add more choices. Liked not having to make a deposit at the time I reserved the rm
Manager Response: Dear Minnie,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your most recent stay, we were happy to read that you found our hotel to be clean and comfortable. Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites in Anaheim hope we get to host you next time you are in town.  Kind regards,

Summary: We just spent two nights in this hotel.  Typical of a Comfort Suites unit.  Breakfast was good, room was clean, convenient location, friendly staff. It's a few blocks from Disneyland but if you're going to be walking all day, it might not be too bad.  We could see a Disney parking lot about 3 blocks away so its not much farther. Traffic is terrible.  Exiting the parking lot you can only go right and there a four lane (all full, all the time) so you are pretty much force to stay in the right-hand turn lane, make a turn and then find your way back to Katella Ave. to go towards Disneyland. Traffic noise is tolerable except for an occasional siren or loud motorcycle, so sleeping is not a problem. All-in-all, good hotel at a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay here with us. We were happy to read that you found our rooms to be clean and our staff to be excellent. Hope you enjoyed your vacation and had safe travels home.

Summary Heading: Miserable, Rude Front Desk Staff on a Power Trip
Summary: I had low expectations staying at this hotel/brand but nevertheless made a reservation.  I arrived shortly after 1PM to attempt to check in. The hotel wasn’t busy and the two front desk agents were just standing there idly. Now, I’m fully aware that the policy is 3PM and it can be difficult to find a room prior to check-in time. However, in any hotel that prides itself on service, the staff will attempt to find a room, even if in another category. It’s a choice that they make in conjunction with their leadership team if they’re going to go the extra step for their guests. I rarely believe that a room is not available when zero effort is made to find out first. In this case, the front desk staff were defiant to even make such an effort to find a room. She even said sarcastically,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great updated hotel within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: We loved our stay here for our Disney vacation. It was a bit longer of a walk than we would have preferred, but for the price, it was well worth it! Even though it was a bit further, it was still an easy walk to the park each day (maybe 20 minutes or so). There were convenient food/coffee/convenience stores along the walk, which was a huge bonus that we utilized each day. The room was always clean. It has also been upgraded recently and they did a great job! The furniture is so nice, the bathrooms are great, and everything just felt fresh. They also had a decent breakfast each morning, which was a great money saver. They offered eggs, sausage, make your own waffles, muffins, pastries, three kinds of cereal, fruit, instant oatmeal, boiled eggs, toast, English muffins, juice, and
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We like to thank you for completing our online survey feedback from our guest is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay. We were please to read that you found our rooms to be comfortable and clean. Also excited to read that you were able to enjoy some of the wonderful, local restaurants, stores within walking distance. We hope you will continue to choose us when you come to town!

Summary: I stayed here earlier this month because it was near the freeway and I had to be at different cities on that trip. My room faced the freeway but I got used to the noise after the first night. The room was decent and staff were nice, but as a whole, I thought the hotel was average. On Sunday, housekeeping didn't come by the room, but I did get a call that afternoon asking if I needed service. Yes, I replied. Shouldn't it be standard for daily service even just to dump trash? There is a parking lot but in the morning I saw cars parked where they could since there wasn't enough space. There's free continental breakfast. The hotel looks like it was updating since I saw new mattresses being delivered. There was a microwave and refrigerator in the room. My biggest issue with the hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Lobby but the room was so so.
Summary: We stayed in the suite with living room and bedroom. The lobby, staff, bar, parking and convenience store were all perfect. The room itself was less than we were hoping for. The living room was pleasant but the bedroom was just a bed two nightstands and a dresser. No pictures on the wall made the room look stark. The pillows were small and the bedding thin and cheap. The walls are thin so you hear your neighbors. Upgrade the bedding/ pillows and add some pictures and this stay would have rated higher. This park is walkable but certainly not close. It’s a $6 Uber to the entrance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed in the Comfort Inn & Suites from June 20th to 24th, 2018. We had travelled down to Anaheim to watch the Toronto Blue Jays baseball games. We also went to Disneyland while we were there. The hotel was centrally located so it was the almost the same walking distance to the ballpark and Disneyland. The rooms were clean and comfortable. We had no issues at all other than the noise from the freeway traffic. The complimentary breakfast in the morning was nice. There is also lots of restaurants about a block or so away from the hotel. It was quite hot when we were there so the pool was refreshing. Overall we were quite happy with our stay and would return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for 14 nights as a family of 4 with 2 children (8 & 5). The hotel is fairly well positioned for Disney but is about 20-25 minute walk. Anaheim Garden Walk is about 10 minutes walk allowing for cross walks. The hotel is very basic, no bar or restaurant but does provide a reasonable breakfast as part of the stay. They are currently modernising the property which it is in need of. We didn’t have any issues with anything during our stay as we really only used the hotel as a base. There is a reasonable pool and spa. If booking, be sure to specify a quiet room as the hotel is at the side of the freeway and the side facing it is apparently noisy. We were on the 4th floor. The staff were all very courteous and friendly. For the money, this isn’t a bad choice. Only giving 3
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We were please to read that you found our hotel to be comfortable. We were also excited to read that you were able to enjoy some of the local restaurants within walking distance. We hope you will continue to choose us when you come to town.

Summary: This is the 3rd time we have stayed at this hotel. Each time has been great! Friendly staff, clean rooms, good location and free breakfast! We went to Disneyland and Disney’s California Adventure while we stayed here. The hotel sells tickets for the same price as Disney. It is nice to be able to already have the tickets so you don’t have to stand in line when you get there! We will be back to stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for continuing staying with us. We are please to serve you and look forward to your return!

Summary: Although this site states this property has in room refrigerators and self laundry, it doesn't...two amenities (among others) I look for in a property.  The rooms are on the smaller size and believe the beds are more of a full size than a queen. The positive:  the rooms are clean and the staff friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback; thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites.

Summary: We were happy with everything with our stay except our initial arrival, hence the 4 stars.   It took us a while to get greeted up front and checked in and once we were, we were given incorrect information about parking and entering the building. Besides that,everything was great.   The rooms were clean, staff was friendly, continental breakfast bar was always stocked and tasted good. For the price, we were very happy.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and we apologize for any inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: Overall a nice stay for a short visit
Summary: The location was perfect, basically 1 mile from the parking lots for Disneyland, this is a lot of the reason we selected this hotel for our visit. Hotel is going through a re-model so several sections were closed off and there was only 1 working elevator but overall the property was nice looking, check in was fast and she was very helpful. Only negative was when I went to pull back the sheets on one of the beds in our room, found a huge stain on the sheet. It had been washed so it was missed by the GRA when cleaning the room and should have been put in reject linen. We pulled the sheet off the bed as the rest was clean and it was no worries. Would 100% stay at this hotel again on our next trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We highly appreciate your feedback; we are glad you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites. We look forward to you next visit. Have a great day!

Summary: We stayed at this nice property for 2 nights prior to our Disneyland trip. The hotel is clean, rooms are comfortable,  staff is friendly,  and the breakfast was a nice start to each morning. It's in a convenient location,  on katella Avenue just off of I5. Plenty to see & do within walking distance. We ate at cheesecake factory, which was only a 5 minute walk from the hotel. We washed our clothes at the laundry mat right next door,  so that too, was convenient. Overall,  a nice place to stay. I recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to fill out our online survey with such positive feedback!  I have shared your comments with my staff, and they join me in thanking you for your kind words.  We take pride in our hotel and the services we provide and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay.  We are looking forward to providing you the same pleasant accommodations and service the next time you are in town.

Summary: My biggest complaint was the lack of a fridge in the room. It was very inconvenient not to have a fridge kn the room, especially since it is listed in the amenities. I asked at the front if all the rooms lack a fridge and was told they don't have them anymore.  I stayed 3 nights and the room wad only cleaned once. Breakfast was the usual . Room was spacious and hotel was close to restaurants and attractions. The pool was clean and heated.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We can assure you that your feedback are very important to us and . Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to see you in the near future.

Summary: Hotel is an odd location on the corner of a very busy intersection. Parking lot is of nice size. Check in was quick.  So glad they don't charge some ridiculous incidental deposit like other Anaheim hotels do. Room is on the smaller side. Window latch was busted and there's no screen. It also looks like some time ago this hotel had nice picture windows or balconies but they were taken out and the new windows are drafty and the sealent is cracking. Tv is too small for the room. Has a decent channel lineup but will turn it's self off after awhile. Bed was on the firm side. Plenty of pillows. HVAC unit is outdated, noisy and when you turn the heater on it smells like burnt plastic. Bathroom is a good size but it's outdated. Needs a new shower head for sure. Towels are those nice
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear you had a pleasant stay. We look forward to see you in the near future.

Summary: We were here for a business Weekend.  The location is ok. You‘re quick in almost every spot The rooms are great. Quite big and with great beds  The breakfast is poor, but there are other possibilities   Close the Disneyland 😉
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We love receiving feedback about your stay here with us. Happy to read that you found our rooms to be clean and the beds comfortable. Thank you for staying with us we look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Recent stay at the Comfort Inn & Suites Anaheim.
Summary: The hotel itself was clean, modern and quite nice with a continental breakfast . However if you don't have a vehicle it's a long walk to the Disney Parks, they do not offer any type of shuttle service to the Disney Parks. I would also pass along some advice that I found online, try to get a room on the parking lot side of the hotel. The other side faces I-5 and there is constant road noise, but the hotel is convenient for access to that Interstate because of this.
Manager Response: Dear Doo1adams, We love receiving feedback from you about your stay here with us. We were so glad t read that you fund our hotel to be clean and that you enjoyed our breakfast. So sorry we weren't able to provide shuttle services the park. Thank you for staying with us. Hope you enjoyed your vacation and had safe travels home.

Summary Heading: Fine hotel. Don't use the taxis
Summary: The hotel itself is fine - nice big rooms, friendly service. But if you need a car, don't use the car service they organise (called Vogera Transportation). It is extortionately expensive and what's worse the driver is rude - aggressive, comfrontational, snide and intimidating. Ruined the experience for me. Also be prepared for paper plates and plastic cutlery at breakfast!
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us, we were glad to read that you found are rooms big and nice and our staff friendly. In the other hand we would like to apologize for the bad experience you had with car service. Your comments have been made available to management for their review so that appropriate action may be taken to make improvements. We hope to provide you with a more exceptional experience in the future.

Summary: Some of the two things I look for are Clean Rooms and friendly staff. This had both. Breakfast is just fine for a free breakfast. Easy walking distance to Disneyland and Anaheim Garden Walk (great restaurants located here and some shopping). Pool is not huge but sufficient. Hot tub is good after a day at the park. Ask for room on the opposite side of freeway is recommended or bring ear plugs. I would definitely recommend to other travelers! This place is a hidden gem in bang for your $ so close to the park
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We were please to read that you found our rooms to be clean and our staff friendly. We were also excited that you were able to enjoy some of the wonderful, local restaurants within walking distance.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Stayed here during a convention for 4 nights. Room was standard, furniture a little bumped up but the bed was very comfortable and the room was very clean. Breakfast was limited but filled the need. Pool area was good and the area in general was very quiet. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad to hear you had  a pleasant stay. We look forward to see you in the near future. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: 80s-Style Comfort On - Literally - The Edge of Disneyland
Summary: Nothing fancy (holdover from the 80s...more motel-like), but comfortable and - surprisingly given it's located at a major intersection - very quiet. Check-in and -out was quick and easy, with great staff and immediate service when called upon. Across the street is a petrol station with typical drinks / foods / meds etc. The room had a fridge, so load up. Adjacent to the hotel is a roadway w/sidewalk that cuts through Disneyland to Katella Ave. Turn left and walk a few minutes to the Convention Centre. There are numerous eateries in the vicinity though these are closer to the Convention Centre. Cheesecake Factory is great for salads and meals at decent prices. So. Harbour also has numerous places, and you can walk that route back to the hotel (check a map). That route isn't as
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We would like to thank you for completing our online survey. Feedback from our guest is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay. Thank you for your visit we hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: this hotel is very clean and kept up on maintenance. it was so nice to stay here especially after a long day at Disneyland which is very close. the price was just right also compared to other hotels in the vicinity. would so stay here again and highly recommend a stay here if in the area. also knott's is not much of a drive if you decide to visit there.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We love receiving feedback from you about your stay with us. We were glad to read you found the hotel to be clean. We hope you will think of us next time you are in the area.  Hope you enjoyed your vacation and safe travels home!

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel on three occasions in the last three years. The rooms are always clean and comfortable. I've stayed on both the freeway side and the Disneyland side of the building without too much trouble with noise from the traffic.  Breakfast is great before heading out to enjoy days at Disneyland or touring Los Angeles. Walking distance from Disneyland and Angels Stadium as well makes it a no brainer if that's why you're visiting Anaheim. An easy drive to/from LAX and many other attractions. I'm likely to stay again next time I'm in So Cal.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay; we appreciate your positive feedback ! Have a great day !.

Summary: The hotel was clean and quiet! Quick check-in. We came in late and left early. Breakfast was alright, free wifi. Room was big and comfortable. I recommend this hotel if you're planning to go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate hearing from you. Hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Best Dining Room In All the Land?
Summary: Honestly, this chain has continued to impress me. From Memphis, Tennessee to Anaheim California I have found it to be courteously staffed, comfortably "amenity-ified", and within close proximity of nearby attractions. Plus, each location often has it's own personal quirks. For instance this one's breakfast room is spacious and gives off a delightful restaurant-ey vibe. And because this is Anaheim, don't be too shocked when you see a Captain Hook sharing a bagel with Tinker Bell.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay here. We were very glad to read you found the hotel to be comfortable and enjoyed our amenities. We hope you will think of us next time you have to come to Anaheim.  Hope you enjoyed your vacation and had safe travels home.

Summary Heading: Good value - Anaheim a nice off-airport choice
Summary: We chose this location, having flown in to LAX, allowing us a day to visit locally before heading up to Central California, and the price was nice. The hotel was clean, we appreciated the non-smoking, and the double-queen suite was pleasant. Breakfast itself was excellent.  The dining room was particularly spacious.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for taking the time let us know about your stay here. We were very glad to read that you found the hotel to be clean and that you enjoyed your California trip. Hope to see in the future!

Summary: Stayed at this Comfort Inn after needing quick place to stay for Disneyland weekend. Staff was friendly in check in. We had asked for two beds but they had us booked for one bed. Staff helped us get room with two beds which my daughter and I were very grateful for. Room faced the freeway so lots of car noise but we were tired so didn’t mind. Only negatives were heater smelled awful when turned on and cable wasn’t working properly. It would turn off for few seconds every few minutes. They would have been quick fixes if we had reported them and not huge deal. Room was clean. And fine for what we needed. We would use this hotel again possibly in the future for quick stay.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We love receiving feedback from you about your stay here with us. We were so glad to read that you found our staff to be very helpful. We will have maintenance look into the items you mention to make sure we get the problem taken care of. Hope you enjoyed your Disneyland weekend and had safe travels home.

Summary: I was very pleased to stay at this hotel, clean and nice area. The staff was super friendly and the free breakfast was good. Family friendly and not very far from top restaurants near the area. 7 minutes away from Downtown Disney and the parks.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We were please to read that you found our hotel to be clean and staff friendly. We were also excited to read that you were able to enjoy some of the wonderful, local restaurants within walking distance. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed here for a family trip to Knots Berry Farm which is only 10-15 mins away. The room was clean and the beds were very comfortable,the room was actually big from what it looks in the pictures. Breakfast was ok,i loved the waffles not a fan of the eggs and sausage,they had other options available like cereal,toast,muffins,fruits etc....I would definitely stay here again maybe summer time so i can get in the pool.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and we highly appreciate your feedback. Thank you for staying at Comfort Inn & Suites.

Summary: Found these rooms to be clean and cozy. Front desk staff was super helpful and accommodating. Would highly recommend this hotel if going to Disney. Ranged between $7-$10USD to get an Uber one way. Continental breakfast was nothing special but was good and fresh.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay here at Comfort Inn & Suites. We were trilled to read you found the hotel to be comfortable and our staff helpful. Hope you enjoy your vacation and had safe travels home.

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a Disneyland visit
Summary: This hotel is just several blocks from Disneyland, and is one of the nicest in the area without the high price of the Disney resort or other high end hotels.  The rooms are nice, clean, and comfortable.  Breakfast was great, and the seating area was very large.  Parking is easy and it's close to the freeway and it's a short drive to Disneyland.  You could walk from this hotel, but it would be a bit long.  We will stay here again next time we make a trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Your feedback is very much appreciated; we are thrilled to hear your stay was pleasant and we appreciate your business. Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites at Anaheim.

Summary: Very convenient walking distance to disney toon town and disneyland park. Breakfast is more than enough,  good quality and fulfilling.  Big rooms,  comfirtable beds,  very nice reception and clean ambience.  We will stay here again next time
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We highly appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for staying at Comfort Inn & Suites.

Summary: As usual the window A/C was a little noisy. And the freeway side is a bit loud but also cheaper. Bed was a little hard. Everything else was very nice and well kept, only other improvement might be the breakfast, could add a few more items, it was good but limited. Overall very satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your feedback ; we appreciate your business. Have a nice day !

Summary: My mom and I stayed here one night for a concert at The Grove nearby. Nice clean room with two queen beds and spacious bathroom for getting ready. We utilized both the in-room fridge and microwave which was very handy for our leftovers! The breakfast area in the morning was well-stocked with fresh food and coffee, and there was a really nice area for dining. It was a bit pricey, but I think that’s because it’s near Disneyland. Overall great stay, wish we had longer there!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are thrilled to hear you had a pleasant stay. Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites.

Summary Heading: Easy for Disneyland - has what you need.
Summary: Clean, quiet, pretty good breakfast - more than just juice coffee and pastries. Not too far from Disneyland but you'll need to drive - it's about a mile away or so. Rooms are what you should expect for this price, clean and quiet even on the freeway side. There is a small business center that no one used during my stay so I had it to myself each morning. Coffee goes out much earlier than breakfast - early as 5 am. Breakfast starts at 6:30. Here is the best tip - buy your park tickets at the front desk!!! Save time!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We highly appreciate your feedback and we are glad you enjoyed your stay .

Summary Heading: Decent place for the price and location
Summary: The room was clean and overall in good shape. The curtains would not properly cover the windows and the morning sun was very strong into the room. The room has a window air conditioner and causes the whole window to rattle when it runs. Hard for light sleepers.  Breakfast was included and was stocked very well.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your review, we really appreciate earing from you. We will look into the items you mentioned. Hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: This is what all hotels should be judged by. We travel a lot and stay in many hotels. This had to be by far one of the cleanest ever. At any given time you will see floors being vacuumed or mopped. Breakfast area has throw pillows that are always perfectly placed after use. I had one small issue which I addressed with GM Farzana Kakar. She apologized and immediately took care of the situation. Comfortable beds. Everybody that works in this hotel takes great pride in it and it shows. Take Uber to Disneyland, $6.00.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your comments; we appreciate your words of encouragement and they will be passes to my staff. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Great find at a reasonable price in Anaheim
Summary: We stayed here for one night before we walked at the CHOC Walk to benefit the children's hospital.  Everything was great.  The room was comfortable, had amenities I would have expected in a higher-priced place.  Richard and Carla were very friendly and helpful at check-in.  The pool was sparkling clean, and we enjoyed it immensely.  Breakfast was fluffy scrambled eggs, sausage, hard-boiled eggs, all kinds of cereal and pastries and make-your-own waffles.  Coffee was good.  There was also whole pieces of fruit.  We'd definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We appreciate your words of encouragement and they will be passed to my staff. Thank you for choosing to stay with us; we look forward to your return visit.

Summary: I planned a family vacation to Knotts Berry Farm for my immediate and extended family. We were looking for certain amenities such as pool, exercise equipment, and a free breakfast because we had a large party with children.  I contacted Choice hotels because they had been helpful in the past and they recommended Comfort Inn.  We had a total of 5 rooms spending over $ 2000 with everything we requested, we were happy.  Check-in went smooth, but we were caught off guard when they would not allow us to place the deposit on a credit card because we were paying with cash.  Odd, because that had never happened before but okay the nice gentleman at the counter explained to us that we will have to give a $100 cash deposit and it will be return upon checkout.  The hotel was old and worn
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for many reasons.  First we are choice guests and were going to stay at the Clarion as that was where are convention booked us.  However, Clarion or the scheduling agency one made a mistake and did not give us the room we scheduled.  Luckily we found out enough in advance and I found this Clarion.  Great rooms, pool is nice, breakfast is warm and plentiful.  They could use more seating as a lot of Disney guests stay here. You are over a mile to Disney and just at a mile to the convention center.  It is a $5 Uber ride to the convention center or a short walk so its not bad.  Staff have been nothing but courteous. Surprisingly this is a very quiet hotel.  The staff told us that and they work to ensure it.  One thing as we did a seven night stay, and this is
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We highly appreciate such positive feedback. Glad you had a pleasant stay. Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites In Anaheim, we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Free Breakfast, Bed Bugs and Deplorable Management!!!
Summary: Hotel is nicely updated but comes with poor management and aggravation! Not to mention the BED BUGS we found in our room!!! Although it's not uncommon to find them, it is uncommon to have MANAGEMENT ignore the issue!!! Young nice inexperienced hotel staff did give us another room but offered nothing to treat our luggage and items in the room. MANAGEMENT ignored our requests for calls and assistance. I would skip the lower price, free breakfast and bed bugs and pay to stay at a Disney hotel where they would bend over backwards to address and accommodate any issues!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We work really hard to provide each guest with exceptional service. We hope that you will change your mind and give Comfort Inn & Suites another chance. We highly appreciate your business and feedback. Thank you for staying at Comfort Inn & Suites.

Summary: Nice hotel near Disneyland.  Slightly noisy rooms if you're overlooking the entrance to I-5, but not bad.  Breakfast can be a madhouse due to all the Disney and Knotts Berry Farms, but the staff did a good job keeping up with the crowd.  Easy access to the highway, and plenty of food around being as close to Disneyland as the hotel is.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We highly appreciate your positive feedback. Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Nice room amenities with a basic free hot breakfast.  Many higher priced hotels don't provide that! The dining area was very nice with appropriate seating for family groups.  Nice gym room - but 1 treadmill was not working.  Pool and spa area were nice - they have handicapped chair lifts for both.  If you are planning a Disney adventure, this would be a good location to stay.  Many restaurants and shops within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your positive feedback, we really appreciated. Glad you had a pleasant stay. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: Stayed at the hotel three nights! First night a noticed a towel with a brown stain on It, I just place the towel on the ground and grabbed a clean one. Second night I noticed dried noodles on the floor (I'm sure they are still there in room 202 near the nightstand) did I complain No! The last night I noticed the sheets were stained as if someone was eating in the bed I just used the other bed. I basically didn't expect much from this hotel because I'm a SPG member and generally stay only at their properties but since I was with a group of 20 people I stayed their spending over $2k for 5 room (price wasn't bad)... The last day I had my sister go check out of her room so she could get my $100 cash deposit back... My sister hands me $60 because the hotel took out $40 for "stained
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We have taken the measures necessary to fix the issue. Your money was refunded on the same day . Thank you for staying at Comfort Inn & Suites.

Summary: Booked my hotel over the phone.  Very friendly staff.  When we arrived, Jorge was really nice.  Stayed for 5 nights.  The price was pretty good granted the Disney convention was happening that weekend.  Breakfast was included - not bad, very simple.  Free parking is a plus (try not to park under the trees in the back-you may see ants on your car).  The room was great.  I could hear the cars/motorcycles at night but it didn't bother me.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your positive feedback is it greatly appreciated. Glad you had a pleasant stay. Hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: Good things about this hotel: The price is what draws you to come here and it is close to Disneyland and is located next to the 5 Freeway. Room is clean and have plenty of towels, Wifi is good and elevator is fast, Breakfast selection is minimal but it is ok, the staff replenish the food really fast, they have a pool (but did not get any chance to swim), and a business center.   The not so good about this hotel: The aircon is too noisy and their pillows can give you a bad stiff neck.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey. Glad you had a pleasant stay. Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Great hotel, good service,  clean beds, great breakfast,  ac could be better. Pool & hot tub was fantastic! I will stay there again, do not go to Holiday Inn Express Fullerton, it was a nightmare. Glad we moved to Comfort Inn. :)
Manager Response: Dear guest,  We appreciate you feedback, glad you had a pleasant stay.Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites in Anaheim.

Summary: Stayed here for a trip to California adventure. Staff was nice, parking was close even on a busy night (3rd of July). There was an ant on the couch in the lobby that probably got dragged in on someone's luggage. I didn't see ants anywhere else. The room was nice, looked updated and was clean. The bed wasn't super comfy, but good enough. The pillows were a little too plump and rough for me, but I'm picky about pillows. I had brought my own, but had too many things to carry in so I left it in the car. Slept ok on the bed. If I remember right, it was around the same price as some other hotels that were closer to the park and we didn't choose those because of some reviews we read, but now that I have seen the area, I would choose the ones closer to the parks next time. They all seem
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey, your feedback is very important to us. Hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Very Comfortable Hotel near Disneyland and Anaheim Stadium
Summary: I had a great night at this Anaheim property.  The staff was wonderful; recommending restaurants in the area.  This is a mile from Anaheim stadium and the same from Disneyland.  The property is on the I-5 freeway but you hear no noise.  The price is very, very reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear guest ,  It is always pleasant to hear positive feedback. We are glad to hear you had  a pleasant stay. We look forward to see you in the near future. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: My husband and I recently spent four nights at the Comfort Inn in Anaheim, CA.  We chose the location for it's proximity to Disneyland which is an easy 1.5 mile walk each way.  We did not notice the highway noise others have mentioned in their reviews.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The room was very clean and seemed to be recently updated.  The king-sized bed was comfortable with fresh, crisp linens and a selection of pillows.  It's always nice to have a refrigerator and microwave.  The bathroom was spacious with a large counter on which to spread out our personal items.  There was plenty of free parking available for our rental car in the lot.  The breakfast was fine, although it is the exact same selections each and every day.  It would be nice to switch from sausage
Manager Response: Dear guest ,  Thank you for your feedback. It is always pleasant to hear about our guest experience . We are glad to hear you enjoy your stay with us. We hope to see you in the near future. Thank you for staying at Comfort Inn.

Summary: Me and my husband got married back home in England then 3 days later we checked into this hotel to start our 3 week honeymoon!   We used this hotel as our 'base' hotel. We stayed elsewhere when we travelled to San Diego for a couple of days.  We were very surprised at how much we enjoyed our stay here, I don't really have any negative comments to say about it!   Our room was really big, nice and clean and modern. We loved that it had a fridge and microwave. Great for keeping our drinks cool and for bringing home our leftovers!  We enjoyed the free fruit infused water in reception, nice and refreshing when coming in after the theme parks.  I wasn't very keen on the breakfast. I love that it's free and it's there if you want it but the most I ever got was a muffin on the way out!
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey. We appreciate your business and feedback, thank you for choosing to stay at Comfort Inn & Suites Anaheim. Glad you had a pleasant stay and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.

Summary: We arrived really early for our reservations knowing that we couldn't get in our room yet, front desk girl said no problem we'll go ahead and upgrade you to a "quite room" and when you return from the park, we'll have everything ready for you.  Room was wonderful, Hot breakfast was plentiful and there was lots of seating.  We have stayed and this Comfort Inn and Suites 3 times before and this will not be our last stay.  King size bed and lots of room in the bathroom for two people to be in there at the same time.  LOVE this location.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear our staff where able to check you in early. We hope to see you in the near future. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Took a last-minute trip to Disneyland and booked this hotel. Was loud because it was on the freeway. Rooms were very dated and my door didn't seem like it would close because it was so old. The staff was amazing which made up for The mediocrity of this hotel. They try very hard to make this place OK but it just fell short.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. I will like to mention that you can always request a room away from the freeway. If available we will be more than happy to accommodate you and your family. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: The person who was working the front desk The Weekend of the 8th & 9th was so rude to my daughter who is Hispanic and that is the only reason we can think of because when I went down there and I'm white she was nice to me. I was definitely livid when I went to talk to her but I just wanted to see how she treated me. She definitely seemed racist to me. There is no way I would stay there again. 👎
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience you and your family experience during your stay. However I will like to mention all of our employees will treat each and every single one of our guest with professionalism. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: I contacted the Comfort Inn & Suites when my original preferred location was not available for our group. From the moment I spoke to the group sales manager, Maria, I felt confident that our group would be handled professionally.  As a high school music teacher, I often travel with students to festivals and various performances. Many times, hotels are hesitant to deal with student groups because of bad experiences in the past. The Comfort Inn & Suites was welcoming and responsive to all of my questions and requests. They were able to work within my budget and were perfectly prepared for our arrival. There was ample space for our bus to park, which was appreciated. Every room was ready, the room key envelopes were clearly labeled with student names, and the rooms were all located
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for the awesome feedback. It is always pleasant to hear when guest recognize our work. We are happy to hear the location and everything else worked just great for you and the group. I have share your review with our staff and we are please to know you and the group enjoyed their stay. Thank you for staying with us . We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: An okay hotel at an okay price, not walking distance to Disney
Summary: The hotel has nice rooms but did not honor our request for adjacent rooms for a family vacation.  Their housekeeping is atrocious and our room was not made up when we returned from Disneyland in the late afternoon and early evening despite putting out a makeup this room sign when we left in the early morning.  They make much of their location close to Disney which is simply not the case as it is a very long walk to Disney from the hotel.  They also emphasize the full complimentary breakfast which was a genuine incentive as we were traveling with four kids, three parents and two grandparents and wanted a good start to the mornings with a big meal and no lunch but a good dinner.  The quality of the breakfast while ample was sorely lacking.  The pool was uninviting and overrun with
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear you are unhappy with the hotel. Anytime our guest want early housekeeping it has to be requested, and if housekeeping for any reason skips your room is most likely because a no disturbing sign was left in the room. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great Place for a Great Price
Summary: My niece & her family chose to stay at this location during their vacation so I booked a couple of nights as well.  I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this property.  I saw upgrades happening to some of the rooms.  I must have been in a room that was recently upgraded.  It was great!  Very roomie with a king bed and a small couch.  I love that there was a microwave and a good size fridge.  We took advantage of the daily breakfast.  It was surprisingly good!  Over two days I tried the eggs, sausage, waffle and english muffins.  Everything was very good!  Lots of flavor which is sadly missing when food is mass-produced.  And I really liked the coffee too.  Over all, it was a very pleasant stay and I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear your positive feedback as well as to know you had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you in the near future. We can't wait for you to see all the complete remodeling in the rooms.

Summary: The Comfort Inn & Suites in Anaheim was a great fit for my family and I while we were visiting for a short trip to Disneyland. Our rooms were always clean upon return and so was the overall hotel. Prior to booking, the prices were a bit surprising, as I've stayed at several Comfort Inn & Suites and never paid so much, but California living is not very affordable to begin with. Overall, the choice and cost worked perfectly for my family and I.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you and your family had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Way over priced!! The hotel has a pleasant lobby but the rooms are horrid!! Not only is it LOUD being right next to the HWY but the room I was in was full of stains on the chairs and carpet! The bed was uncomfortable and the TV was a joke. The ironing board was metal with no padding. I had to use a towel to iron my clothes. The restroom was clean at least. I can't believe I paid 170 a night for this crap hotel. I'm checking out a day early. I can't bear this place for 3 nights!!!
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear you feel this way about the hotel. Anytime our guest are unhappy about their stay we encourage them to inform the front desk right away. If you find the hotel not to meet your standards as soon as you check in we will check you out free of charge . Once again we apologize for not meeting your expectations.

Summary: This place is safe, in a nice neighborhood. It is clean and the staff are friendly.  The only issue I have with this place is the breakfast which has no variety and pretty much the same every single day. May I suggest some kind of alterations to the breakfast. I think with some minor changes you can have a major difference,
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are glad to had hear you had a pleasant stay. We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to see you in the near future.

Summary: After many issues with flights and lost luggage the staff at the Comfort Inn and suites couldn't be more helpful and understanding. We were able to check in early, we were provided with many toiletries after ours were all lost on flights, the staff gave recommendations on nearby places to get food, gave us options on how to experience Disneyland on a budget and were overall friendly and helpful which is exactly what you want when everything else is going wrong. I highly recommend this hotel as they have fantastic staff willing to help out and make life easier for you
Manager Response: Dear Guest, It is always pleasant to hear positive feedback. We really appreciate your business. Our staff work had to provide each and everyone of our guest memorable stay. We hope to see you soon again in the future. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: I was very happy with my stay here. The rooms and bathrooms are clean. The breakfast is also quite decent. The place is less than a mile from the Anaheim Convention Center so the location is also quite good. There are grocery stores right next door, which is very convenient. The free internet is fast.  The best part of the stay was the SUPER FRIENDLY staff. Extremely warm, polite, courteous and helpful. They were the icing on the cake. All in all, a great budget hotel if you are not looking for anything super fancy. They tick all the checkboxes for a basic budget Inn.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. It is always pleasant to hear our guest enjoy their stay. We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family. Our staff work hard to provide each and everyone of our guest a pleasant stay. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Nice room, nothing fancy, but clean and comfortable!  Close to Disney and many places to eat.   Friendly, helpful, staff always welcoming when you come in.   If I'm ever in the area again, I would stay there without hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Lovely friendly staff. Clean and comfortable room, not far from Disneyland. Decent breakfast included in the price catering to various tastes. Also close to a laundromat and market. If you feel like a short stroll, plenty of restaurants etc nearby
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Room is good. Location is on a sketchy block.
Summary: Take a short 2 minute walk to the adjoining strip mall just west of the property and you will move your car to a spot where you can see it out your room window. This is not a very safe and secure location. I am comparing this with stays at other nearby properties.  The staff was great. The value was excellent. The sleep was okay. The eating was tasty. The room was okay with no complaints.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. All of our staff are well trained to provide each and everyone one of guest a pleasant stay. We hope to see you soon . Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We had a really good stay in The Comfort Inn! It is quite close to Disneyland and a few cafes/restaraunts are right across the road. The rooms are very comfortable and homely which was really nice being so far away from home! Also breakfast is quite good in the morning :)
Manager Response: Dear guest, We appreciate your feedback. It is pleasant to hear you and your family had a great stay. Thank you for your business, we look forward to see yo in the near future.

Summary: Nice hotel, comfortable room, only problem is it's right next to the freeway on ramp. Make sure to get an odd numbered room; even numbers back up to the freeway - you hear the acceleration noise all night long, bummer.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Some of the furniture was a little dirty, but everything else was lovely. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. Very close to Disneyland too! I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends that are on a budget!
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Staff were extremely friendly yet professional....helpful in getting us checkin in early, but even if they weren't able to do that, they were still really sweet. Room was comfortable and clean but a tiny bit noisy cause of the location near the highway. However, fridge and microwave were in the room which I didn't expect. Easy to walk to the convention centre and to work. Breakfast was simple but good. :)
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are glad to hear the location worked great for you. Thank you for your positive feed back . We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Helpful staff. Maria at checkin was super helpful and accommodating in letting me check in a few hours early. Comfortable room but a tiny bit noisy as the window, but other than that I had a nice two day stay. It's an easy walk to get to where I needed to go. Reception arranged for a taxi and called me early to say it was already there. Staff are on top of things at this cute hotel.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your complements. Our staff work hard to provide a superior experience for each of our guest. We are glad to hear your had a pleasant sstay. Thank you again for staying with us.

Summary: Buddy and I are back in Anaheim and we decided to stay here again since its centralized between Disney and the Honda center.  I was once again able to check in a little early and the staff helped me get Disney Tickets. Chilled in the pool and enjoyed there Breakfast in the morning (even tho my buddy missed out one morning because they closed it 15 minutes early)  I would totally stay here for a 3rd time and hope to do so in the future. Cheers!
Manager Response: Dear guest, It is always pleasant to hear how our guest enjoy their stay.Thank you for continuing to stay with us. We appreciate your business.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a business-personal trip. Attended a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center and a visit to Disneyland. Hotel was a short walk to both venues or you could cab-it. The weather was warm so we strolled every day. The front desk staff were very friendly and accommodating.
