The rooms were very clean and comfortable. Hallways were clean. We were on the opposite side from the freeway so it was quiet and you could see the Disney fireworks every night. Hot tub and pool were clean. Only complaint would be that the hot tub and pool closed early. After a long day at Disney, diner in a restaurant you get back to your room at 9pm and don't have much time to go for a swim or hot tub.  Over all, a recommended place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are glad to hear the hotel worked great for you during your stay. We really appreciate your feedback and we value your business. Thank you for staying with us, we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel so we could walk to Disneyland. The hotel staff was super helpful and nice. The room was really clean. When we got back just past midnight, boy did we sleep great! The mattress was super comfortable and the hotel was really quiet. I was worried because there is a freeway not far from the hotel but we didn't hear the freeway nor other people in the hotel. Highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We will like to thank you for staying with us. It is always pleasant to hear positive feedback. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Everything you need for your Disneyland Trip!
Summary: We stayed at the comfort in suites for the first part of our Honeymoon. The hotel was very clean and comfortable. We were able to buy our tickets from the front office which made things very easy.  There breakfast is very basic but all you need to start your big day at Disneyland! You can order room service from different restaurants around the area which was handy when we got to the hotel late our first night!  We were very happy with the location of the hotel it's just outside the main strip where a lot of the hotels are but we walked every day there and back and didn't have a problem with it. It's probably at 10 - 15 minute walk. The only down side is there were a few homeless people and a couple of dodgy people near the hotel but nothing to bad to worry about.  All in all
Manager Response: Dear guest,  It is always pleasant to hear positive feedback.  The  hotel is located near restaurants and the Disneyland. We are glad to hear the location worked great for you while your stay. We hope to see you soon. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for 1 night to visit Disneyland. I do not regret my choice at all. We could check in very early morning. It was a very nice of that hotel since we were exhausted from 12 hours long flight. Receptionist and manger were very nice and friendly. If you plan to visit Disneyland I would suggest to buy tickets in  advance from this hotel instead of buying through the park. Even though they don't have a shuttle to Disneyland they can arrange a shuttle for hotel guests for very reasonable cost. Breakfast was awesome. Hotel location also very close to restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family. Our staff worked hard to provide each of our guest with excellent service. As you mention we do sell tickets, we are glad to hear you were able to purchase them in advance and avoided the ticket line. We appreciate your business and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Great Hotel , very nice new rooms  Very safe nice Neighborhood no problems walking around in evenings. Would stay again. It's just a little far from Disneyland with Traffic. Nice mall with in driving distance kids had fun shopping & Dave & Busters
Manager Response: Dear guest, It is always pleasant to hear our guest feedback. We are glad to hear you like the hotel. Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to see you soon.

Summary: Hotel looked old outside but inside it was fine. Hotel was located next to freeway.  The pool area was small. Room was clean. Breakfast was a disappointment, not much to choice and had convenience food.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: The room was very clean, the beds were comfortable, but I'm not a fan of hotel pillows so I brought my own. We drove to Disneyland, but took uber the next day and it was only $5.15. The breakfast was okay. It was super convenient to have a refrigerator and microwave. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay.

Summary Heading: A good night rest here after attending Minecon
Summary: This hotel is clean and their bed is comfortable! Just what we needed after a long day of walking in Minecon 2016. It is about a mile from the Anaheim Convention Center. I just wished the hotel sells the bus ticket at the front desk. This will make it convenient for first time visitors to travel along Katella Ave. using the OCTA bus without having to look for a place that sells the ticket. Maybe this can be a project to consider for the Anaheim Resort Area marketing association since hotels charge a marketing fee.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your feedback. It is always pleasant to hear positive feedback. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable, and very reasonably priced.
Summary: This property is located about 1.5 miles from the park entrance, about a 1.2 mile walk or taxi/uber ride.  It was very clean, modern, free breakfast, and FREE parking.    We used uber a couple times to get to the park or back and it was 5 to 7.50 dollars.  Very reasonable, considering we were really tired.    The hotel staff was friendly and kind.  We slept well there.     The air conitioner was a little noisy, but it worked well.
Manager Response: Dear Guest , Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We value your feedback and we are glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Ok but not top of the heap
Summary: We had a family trip to Disneyland planned and chose comfort inn and suites based on price and reasonable location.. the place is clean and rooms comparable with run of the mill 3 star hotels .. breakfast ok and staff friendly..  Reasonably close to Cheesecake Factory and a few other restaurants .. but lots of homeless on the street to walk around ( not the hotels fault)   But disappointments are:  1. Incredible highway noise on west side facing busy busy  intersection. All day all night traffic noise.  2. We were told there was a shuttle to Disneyland available... but it's a few blocks away... and readable convenient 5 bucks a day not the 2 bucks they said at the desk, per person.  I would not stay at the place again ..
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered. Thank you for choosing to stay at Comfort Inn and Suites. We hope that you will consider staying at our hotel in the future. We value your feedback and business. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Second stay, will stay here again
Summary: This is my second stay here.  Just as good reviews as before.  Next door to a market and a laundrymat if you need it. It is a 20 minute walk from Disneyland, but two blocks from a direct shuttle.  Breakfast in the lobby is a simple continental breakfast. Perishables (butter, cream) are kept in a small refrigerator on the counter. Free Wi-Fi available.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family. Thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you again anytime you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Very pleased always stay in our owners timeshare but this hotel was clean smelt nice and was suitable for our needs.  Everything was very good and well recommended for the price we have an Anaheim room not overlooking the freeway and the pool was clean and really a good sun trap. Great Location and basic breakfast if needed
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for staying with us. It is always pleasant to hear positive feedback. We hope to see you son.

Summary: The staff was friendly & knowledgeable.The room was comfortable, clean, quiet & nice. The bed was very comfortable. I LOVE the bathroom (although the lighting could be a little brighter).  The Continental Breakfast was good. Located about 1.5 miles from Disneyland. It's an easy walk or very short cab ride.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Great location, close to highway. It takes a while to walk to Disneyland Resort. Room is big enough. Only downside is the A/C is a bit noisy. The free breakfast is pretty good, enough room for a lot of people.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your business.

Summary: Hotel staff checked us in early after a long flight from Australia which was fantastic we were so tired. The beds and pillows are some of the best I have slept in ever.. This hotel is on the budget side of the scale but their rooms don't feel that way. One of the down sides is they don't have a Disney shuttle. The bathrooms are big, clean and very neat. I would recommend to anyone on a budget. Lots of little shops close by which made it easy for me to get my mobile sorted and snacks and drinks from the local 7/11.
Manager Response: Dear guest, It is always pleasant to hear positive feedback. We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family. Thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you  soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights early August and enjoyed our stay.. The room was a good size with everything we needed.  The hotel was spotless including the pool area. Breakfast was basic but enjoyable with free coffee all day.   The hotel itself was well located with a walk to Disneyland of 20 minutes.  Restaurants are close by including Bubba Gumps.. Del taco was just across the road.  Definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear you had a wonderful stay. Housekeeping and our staff sure do a great job to make sure each and every one of our guest have a pleasant stay. We hope to see you soon. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: The room was very nice--roomy with a comfortable bed. Pool and spa were great too. Breakfast was substantial - plentiful eggs, sausage, waffles, juice, etc. The only thing missing was yogurt!! We watched Disneyland fireworks from the pool area.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear you were able to see the fireworks from the pool. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: sold me an invalid Disneyland Park hopper ticket, itchy bed...
Summary: Overview: * The front desk sold me in invalid $160 Disneyland Park Hopper ticket. * I was unable to go to Disneyland Park because of the ticket issue: ruined my trip. * The motel double-billed me for an invalid Disneyland Park Hopper ticket. * The motel wiped out my prepaid VISA card balance between the double billing and additional charges that the front desk cannot explain.  They said to get the additional charges issue fixed via my credit card company.  That negatively impacted my drive home (card no longer worked); and that night and the follow days as I have worked to fix the mess created by this motel. * mites/bugs in the beds: itchy to lay on * The location may be relatively good, but it is located in the first sketchy block of Katella.  It is adjacent to a relatively bad
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Sorry for the any in convenience we cause regarding Disney Ticket. Disney change there pick dates for the labor day weekend, At the ticket both if you could pay $9 extra you would been able to go there right away. people pay the difference at the ticket booth. We again apologize for our mistake., We refund your money right away.  As per Disney calendar itself we have it for all the guests timing they had it for that day was 9.00 am. Distance  wise 20 mins walk for Disneyland. We did not over charge you anything on your visa card. They might Authorization hold on your card. We charge Room + Tax Total for the Room. Thank you for the all the positive feed back about our hotel. You like everything about our hotel.  For the refrigerator being unplug there is sign on the refrigerator about that there is switch under the table to turn it on . We do this for the energy saving.

Summary: Currently staying at this particular hotel. I am very impressed with how clean this place is. When you walk down the halls at any particular time of the day, you will always find someone cleaning. There is always someone at the front desk looking to help you out. check in and out is very easy and the staff is very helpful. I had an issue with my credit card, they let me use the phone and the issue was solved. Very helpful. They also have tickets available to purchase for just about any attraction around and they are willing to help get you there as well. Tickets are sold at gate price. Since I do not have a car with me, it's very nice to know if I need to go somewhere they are willing to help out. There is a Del Taco right across the street with great tacos and very reasonable
Manager Response: Dear guest ,  We are thrilled to know that you have enjoyed your stay at our hotel. Thank you for the great comments. We appreciate your business.

Summary: The room was nice, clean and smelled right. Bed was comfy, carpet was clean and breakfast was pretty good. Staff was really nice and personable. Hampton and comfort inns should always be your no. 1 choice.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Housekeeping does a great job, thank you for your positive feedback. The beds are sure comfortable. Thank you for you staying with us.

Summary: My former college roommates and I went to Anaheim a couple of weeks ago as a part of a four day trip to Southern California. The Comfort Inn is well located for Disneyland and Anaheim Stadium and is adjacent to I-5 for trips to Los Angeles (North) and San Diego(South).The rooms were well maintained, the continental breakfast was plentiful and the staff was courteous. Overall, a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear you and your roommates had great trip . It is always great to hear positive feedback. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed 5 nights here and we were going to be in a 2 queen room on the ground floor but I asked if it was roomy enough for a family of 3 adults and 1 child and they moved us to the third floor. Not sure if the ground floor room was smaller but it was nice to be on the third floor facing away from the freeway. At night, we could see the fireworks display from Disneyland which my son loved. The 2 queen room was clean and has a dresser with tv, nightstand, desk with chair, fridge (small top shelf in the fridge was a freezer which came in handy since we had 4 big ice packs that we were able to freeze for our cooler on our excursions and road trip home) and microwave with shelf above the microwave. Being there for 5 nights, we needed a place with a fridge and microwave. The bathroom
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your feedback.  We are glad to hear your son loved the firework view from the hotel. Thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you soon in the near future.

Summary Heading: Comfort Inn - A Central Vacation Home!
Summary: The Comfort Inn was located in a very strategic location, 5 minutes from the "Toy Story Parking lot" (Best to go to Disneyland), 4 minutes from Angel Stadium and 30 minutes from the beach. The close proximity to Disneyland provides for many Culinary opportunities both at Downtown Disney and the Anaheim area in general. Some of the top ranked Anaheim restaurants (Mimi's Cafe, Carolina's, First Class Pizza, The Pizza Press) are just a few minutes away along with The Anaheim Packing District, a collection of Eateries for every palate!  The Comfort Inn also has a good sized pool and hot tub, perfect for winding down after a busy day! Towels are provided also at the pool.   Free WiFi, Free Parking and Free Breakfast make this reasonably priced hotel a good choice for a fun Anaheim
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights as a base for our visit to Disneyland. Tickets can be purchased from the front desk if needed. Staff also mentioned other excursions could be purchased if you wished to do so. The staff were very helpful and friendly. Rooms clean and comfortable. Breakfast included was buffet style and there was good choice. There is a pool and fitness centre but we didn't use it as we were up early and back late because we were visiting Disneyland. We actually walked to Disney the second day (30 minutes walk). This saves us $18 parking fee that Disney charge. The Disney shuttle bus does not go from the hotel. Overall a great place to stay and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Your feedback are important to us. Thank you for staying with us. W are glad to hear the hotel worked great for you and your family. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, clean updated room, and free full breakfast
Summary: I would definitely stay at this hotel again. I was a little apprehensive because of the price, but it was an exceptional experience for me, a germaphobic, clean-freak. The staff was very friendly, the hotel was clean, the room was updated, comfortable bed, and the full free breakfast was impressive. Not a bad thing to say.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: The room was clean and updated.  Breakfast room was large and good.  My only negative comment was I didn't like how the bathroom door opened out to the room vs inside the bathroom.  Other than that, I'm happy with my stay.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you soon whenever you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: We stayed here for one night and we were sorry to leave excellent
Summary: If you want excellent accommodation for visiting Disneyland this is the best place a to lay your head after an exhausting day at Disneyland we thoroughly enjoyed our stay the staff were lovely the hotel beautiful and the whole experience wonderful
Manager Response: Dear guest, It is always great to hear positive feedback. We are glad to hear the hotel and staff made your experience pleasant. We hope to see you soon. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We were traveling the west coast and needed a room.  We called and asked for a room with 2 queen beds and said they had availability so they transferred us to book the reservation.  Upon check-in, we had a king bed with a pull out sofa bed.  We said we confirmed for the 2 queen beds and the two staff became argumentative with us and said that is not what they told us.  We immediately checked out of the hotel and called the 800 number for Guest Relations and filed a complaint per their suggestion.  I asked the staff to have the manager (Mike) call me when he would be in and he never called back.  The following day I called Guest Relations number back and asked them to have the manager call me.  Again, no phone call from Mike.  According to Guest Relations, Mike has 72 hours to
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I'm sorry to hear about your experience during your stay at that property. However, I believe you have reviewed the incorrect hotel. We do not any pull out sofa beds in any of the rooms at our property and no staff nor manager name Mike.

Summary Heading: Has to be the cleanest hotel i have ever seen and 15 min walk to Disney
Summary: From check in to check out my family was amazed. The hotel is SUPER clean. the halls are spotless the rooms was always spotless. The lobby again spotless.  I even seen with my own eyes staff sweeping the parking lot!!!  The pool was wonderful and my whole family enjoyed it and the hot tub.  As a parent i would like to see the pool a bit more secure.  That was one of my only 2 issues i had. The fridge in my room looks like it fought a war!!  and i wish it would be left on, But high 5 to the staff of this hotel. The front desk did awesome and breakfast was hot and always filled.  Thank you for the great stay. It took us 15 minutes to walk to Disney and the free parking was nice to.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for the positive feedbacks. Housekeeping and all the staff work hard to provide an enjoyable stay for each and every single one of our guest. Thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel on E Katella in Anaheim. The staff are terrific - knowledgable of the area and very helpful in arranging tours - even finding quick solutions when plans go wrong. The housekeeping staff are also top notch - our room was very clean and always put together well when we returned each afternoon. The only drawbacks - the included breakfast is the same each morning and does not have much gluten free options - even yogurt would have been a plus as could not eat the pastries, waffles or cereals on offer. The location is a bit dodgy just off the freeway with some creepers hanging around, so if you don't have a car, ordering in from local delivery places recommended - especially at night. It's also very noisy with police sirens and traffic noise
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for choosing to stay at Comfort Inn & Suites; we appreciate your business.

Summary: Great hotel and so happy to have a chair in room to sit in except it was so filthy I didn't want to sit in it.  Please clean the furniture if you offer it to guests. Rest of facility was great. Could have used a little variety in breakfast offerings. Boring after a couple of days.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. We hope that you will reconsider staying with us for your future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Good location for Disneyland or Anaheim Stadium
Summary: My family of 4 stayed there for one night to go to an Angels game.  The stadium was about a mile away and it's right off the freeway.  Disneyland is also less than a mile away.  Staff was very nice and rooms were clean.     Breakfast was very crowded in the morning at 9am....so go earlier if you want to eat!
Manager Response: Dear guest, We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family. Our staff work hard to make sure our guest have a pleasant stay . We look forward to see you in the near future. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Decent, no frills place. Good price
Summary: We were there for several nights seeing the sites of SoCal. Decent location, Morning breakfast was available (Waffle iron, Scrambled eggs, saugage patties, juices ......). I would advise getting in there early as this is pretty close to Disney and has lots of families trying to get a quick bite in before heading there. A short drive to Huntington Beach. So pretty good location!
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family. We hope to see you anytime you visit Anaheim.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: only thing bad to say about this place is the toilet seats are low. Breakfast had a good variety of things to choose from. Housekeeping was polite and helpful. If you forget your towel at the pool they will bring some out to you.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear you found a variety of items to choose for breakfast. Housekeeping sure does a great job. Thank you again for your business we look forward to see you in the near future.

Summary: We chose Comfort Inn for our trip to DisneyLand. It is fairly close to the freeway, but we had a room on the opposite side. The room was quiet, and very clean. The free breakfast was a plus, traveling on a budget with children. The only downfall might be, there is no shuttle to Disney. It is a bit of a walk, but Taxi service turned out to be a life saver , and fairly cheap. I'm sure it was cheaper than Disney parking !  I would recommend the comfort Inn for anyone staying in the area, and will stay here again on our future trip. Very nice staff.
Manager Response: Dear Guest , We are glad to hear you find our staff friendly and the room to be quiet and clean. Thank you for your positive feedback. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: The good: Great internet, Good breakfast, Clean rooms, Friendly service, close to Disneyland ($7-$11usd) and early check in. The bad: Sleeping on the freeway side is noisy. This was the only downfall.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear you like the hotel. For your next visit you can always request a room away from the freeway if available we will be more than happy to accommodate you. We appreciate your business.

Summary: I'm pretty low key and easy to please when it comes to hotels. This trip, I needed something close to Disneyland, easily accessible from the freeway, clean, and comfortable. Comfort Inn and Suites fit the criteria. The beds were comfortable, the rooms clean and spacious, and the breakfast was even good by my standards. I'm used to less-than-spectacular breakfasts at hotels, but nothing beats a warm waffle, eggs, and sausage first thing in the morning.   I can't think of a single thing to complain about. Everything worked, check-in/check-out was a breeze, the hotel felt safe, and there was an awesome market right next door where my friend and I could pick up water and snacks. It looks a little sketchy, but it is solid. All in all, I would gladly stay again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for staying us. I am delighted to hear that you had a pleasant stay. I am also glad to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast as well. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel not far from disney
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised. The rooms are clean, the bed was comfortable, it was relatively quiet, the breakfast buffet was decent as far as hotel buffets go. My only downside is that the pool is outside and we went during a cold week in May. If you want to save some money on hotel and still afford Disneyland this is a good option
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your positive feedback. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay.

Summary: Great hotel at a decent price, we booked as a package with air and saved $ vs advertised price. Bit of a walk after a long day, there is bus service as an option. Kids ate free so this was an added bonus for us.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad to hear the hotel worked great for you and your family. Thank you for your positive feedback.

Summary: My son, granddaughter and I stayed for two nights. The staff could not be any nicer. Everyone was friendly hotel was clean, pool was nice. The breakfast was nice and the breakfast area was very clean and bright with a nice variety. Plenty of restaurants nearby. Our room faced the freeway but was quiet. However, the air conditioner was very loud, hardly ever turned off. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us. Our entire team works hard to make sure you have a great experience anytime you stay at Comfort Inn. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Pro's: Clean and basic rooms. Friendly & helpful staff here too with lots of restaurants to choose from just a short walk away.   Cons: Got to be the loudest air con I've ever heard!!! We had to turn it off in the end as it was vibrating the room! 😂 😂
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are glad to hear to find our staff friendly . The location is great, we are close to many restaurants as well as to Disneyland. Than you for staying with us. W appreciate your business.

Summary: Room right on freeway on ramp. Noisy. Air conditioner really loud every time it kicked on and walls thin. Heard crying baby all night. Room smelled like a hospital room....good or bad??? Never stay here again. Get what you pay for!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for two nights. Hotel staff were friendly, rooms were clean. Seven minutes drive to Disneyland! Making it a perfect stay! Hotel breakfast was average. Onsite parking available free of charge.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear you liked our staff as well as to the hotel. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Family friendly, walking distance to several great restaurants
Summary: We were staying at the Comfort Inn for business but it appeared that most travelers were going to Disneyland. The park is very close but still would be quite a hike. The property is well used and appears fully occupied most of the time. The breakfast area was huge, hot scrambled eggs plus all the other amenities. We liked the fact that it was within walking distance of CF Changs, Cheesecake Factory and some other nice restaurants as well. Our room fronted the freeway but it was quiet nonetheless. It met all our needs!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are glad to hear the location worked great for you. Thank you for staying with us. We hope to see again soon.

Summary: Have Stayed in several motels, within one block, always passing here, thinking: 'why did I not pick here instead'? so, on this occasion, reserved here. About $150.00 with tax. on a weekend night. Did not partake in the included breakfast. Room was awesome; it was oversized with a couch. everything was fine, no problems. very close to the freeway entrances.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We Are glad to hear you liked the hotel. We hope to see you anytime you visit Anaheim. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: After researching every hotel on Harbor, we came back to our old favorite! Better rates, free breakfast and free parking. . . . It is hard to find all of those in one place near Disney.  It's clean, it's got comfy beds, and a nice staff. . . . And the Del Taco across the street is open 24 hours, so when you close down the park and get back to the hotel at 11 and everyone is hungry. . . . You can do a taco run!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your positive feedback. It is always a pleasure to hear how much our guest enjoy their stay at our Comfort Inn. Thank you for continuing staying with us. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great rooms, but not for the noise-sensitive
Summary: The general cleanliness and design of the rooms and the comfort of the beds were outstanding, but it seemed difficult to escape noise in the hotel.  Oddly, even though the hotel was constantly full, there was minimal noise from the other guests.   The noise came from the freeway, the HVAC, and the refrigerators. I had requested a high floor room in a quiet area, away from the freeway.  I was given a 5th floor room, but it was directly over the entrance ramp to the freeway, so even noisier than being in front of the main freeway.  The refrigerator, which was missing all the shelves on the door, continuously made a loud ticking noise like a time bomb (in addition to the regular operational noise).  The fabric chair was dirty and worn, but the rest of the room condition was quite
Manager Response: Dear Guest , Thank you very much for staying with us. We apologize for any inconvenience during your stay. We appreciate your business and hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: i enjoyed staying here as the bus was available to take us to disneyland and locally which was great. I loved the location as i could relax and not be in the busy city but also could get a tour bus to pick us up from here for our daily tours.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family.Your feedback is very important to us and we can assure you that we will use this information to do everything possible to create an enjoyable experience for each of our guests. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: While the price may not traditionally fall under the "budget" category, it does in this case given the Disney area. Our rate was around $100 a night, which seemed good for a respectable hotel in the area. The room was modern, comfortable, and clean. We showed up at 8am and they even had a room ready for us and were able to take advantage of the breakfast that morning. The breakfast has waffles, eggs, sausage, cereal, and pastries with coffee and tea. It takes about 20 minutes to walk to Disneyland and about 20 minutes to Angels Stadium as well. There is a shuttle bus stop near the hotel to Disneyland, but I did not use it and I am not sure if a cost is associated with it. The hotel sells Disneyland tickets for the same price as the gate or online, which is helpful for avoiding
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are glad to know we had a room available to check you in early. Thank you for your feedback. We will use this information to do everything possible to create an enjoyable experience for each of our guests. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Free breakfast and parking near Disneyland.
Summary: We have stayed in this area in the last, but wanted to stay in a more enclosed hotel.  After looking for a hotel with breakfast and parking included we decided on Comfort Inn and Suites.  We arrived early and they had a room ready for us.  Thank goodness for us as we had been traveling since 4am and needed to freshen up and head over to the park.  Our stay went well.  The only minor problem as that every time someone opens their door it slams and is loud.  We stayed in a room on the on ramp side and very rarely heard any noise.  We had been up for 23 hours straight so we crashed.  Breakfast was good.  The area was very busy, but everyone was able to get what they wanted.  The hotel staff were nice.  Watch out for the new travel marketing fee.  We had this added to out bill upon
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your positive feedbacks. We are glad to hear we were able to check you in early. We hope to see you again anytime you stay in Anaheim .

Summary Heading: Very nice and clean hotel, just a little close to I5
Summary: Was going to visit Disneyland and had researched hotels in the area, but wanted to see them in person before booking, and I am glad I did. Since I was doing Disney by myself, I didn't want to stay at a hotel that seemed easy to access from the street. There was another Choice Hotel with great reviews, but it wasn't a place where I was going to feel safe. So I found this hotel where the rooms could only be accessed from the inside. I booked the hotel online, then stopped at the hotel to see if maybe I could get into the room before I headed to the park. I was pleasantly surprised that they had my reservation already, and a room that was available for me to check into. The front desk clerk was very nice and directed me to the location for Disneyland parking.  The room was very
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is always a pleasure to hear positive feedbacks from our guest. We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We stayed at this property in October for four nights.  We had a really great rate of $79 per night. The bed was comfy and the bathroom is big enough that a couple of people can be in there getting ready at the same time.  The breakfast is the same every day and there's not a huge selection, so I would imagine it could get boring if you're staying more than a couple of nights.  Every employee that we encountered was friendly and helpful.  I would personally never walk to Disneyland from this property, but you can see that other reviewers have with little to no problem.  I love that they have free parking because we parked at Disneyland so we weren't paying for parking twice.  This hotel is very close to the Toy Story parking lot.  We were facing the freeway and didn't have any
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and we apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered. We hope to see you in the future. Thank you for your time.

Summary: We booked this hotel as a last minute decision, as we planned our trip rather late in the year and most of the accommodation in the Disneyland area was fully booked for December 2015. For reference, usually we stay at the Howard Johnson.  First of all, I wouldn’t be concerned about the location at all. For those that say that it’s too far away, they’re just being fussy because it’s a 5 minute walk. I was travelling following disc surgery (so I couldn’t over-exert myself physically) and I coped fine with the distance, even after 12 hours at Disneyland.   In terms of restaurants and amenities close by, there’s a convenience store just metres away and some rather good restaurants about 2 blocks towards Disneyland.   I’m fussy with rooms (I usually like the high end hotels) however,
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Your feedback is very important to us and we can assure you that we will use this information to do everything possible to create an enjoyable experience for each of our guests. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay.  Our room was clean and tidy and was well maintained. Free breakfast was great and the waffle machine was excellent , alongside toast,eggs,muffins etc. Free Wifi. We had a fridge in the room which was helpful. Free Parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. Our breakfast is great we are glad to hear you liked it. Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to see you whenever you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Room was about what was expected. Reasonably clean for an older hotel. Prefer rooms with the washable quilts and these did not seem to be. The bottom sheet seemed dirty in one area, but may just have been very worn. Either way it should not have been on the bed. Vanity was in the shower area, but there was a mirror with nearby outlet in the room making it easier for the family to get ready. Breakfast was about average for the complimentary breakfast places. Hotel price matches what I expect for this hotel. However, I would probably spend a little more and stay elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We like to thank you for staying wih us. In regards to the sheets thank you for bringing it to our attention . We do hope you consider staying with us next time you visit Anaheim. We appreciate your business.

Summary: I always think that making an hotel review is something very subjective and kind of personal, because we all are different persons, we always came from different places, have different costumes, habits or ways to see things. So, i rather prefer to make a list of things i notice during my stay and either I like or dislike. Hope it work for u..  *Great Location, just few minutes to Disney's Parks and restaurants. *Free Parking. *Free Hot Breakfast, reasonable good, fruits, juice, egg, sausage, waffles, bread, muffins, cereals, oatmeal, coffee, milk. *Very nice and helpful staff. *Disney Tickets available in front desk. *Computers (don't know if there's a printer available). *Gym, enough equipment so u dont skip a day in your routine. *Deformed bed, it's foamy structure get kind of
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the valuable feedback you have provided to us. We appreciate you choosing Comfort inn & suites. We hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: So nice to have the new Anaheim Garden Walk nearby. Also, well within walking distance of Disneyland, so appreciated the free parking at the hotel very much. Loved the clean and quickly responding elevators (so many hotels seem to forget to clean the elevators!). Also walked to the Anaheim main gate (at Disneyland) transit stop and got a $3.00 bus to Knotts Berry Farm, saving me the $17.00 to park there. LOVED your hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback. We look forward to having you stay with us in the future. Thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites !

Summary Heading: Long walk from Disneyland but great hotel
Summary: Family and I stayed in California for two weeks and stayed in four different hotels. Comfort Inn and Suites was our favourite out of the four. There's an outdoor pool, a gym, free wifi, and free hot breakfast. The only downside was that the neighbourhood was pretty sketchy and if you're planning on going to Disneyland, be prepared to walk about 25 minutes. Walking to Disneyland in the morning isn't too bad since you're all energized and ready to play, but walking back to the hotel at night was hard since you'll be tired from spending the day at the parks and at that point you just want to get back to the hotel and sleep. Other than that, loved the hotel. But I'll probably pay a little extra for a closer hotel near Disneyland next time.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. Your feedback are important to us. We hope you consider staying with us again whenever you visit Anaheim, Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Great, clean, free wifi and breakfast. A keeper.
Summary: I was concerned that the location would be noisy, being on the corner of Katella and the 5, but it was actually quiet. The free internet was fast and I was on it all day for work. Free breakfast includes make-your-own waffles. Surprised there was no yogurt. Hotel seemed clean and nice. Desk people nice too. No problems. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad to hear the location worked great for you. Our entire staff works hard to provide you with a pleasant stay. Thank you for staying with us. We look forward to see you soon.

Summary: The rooms are large and clean, there is some wear showing but considering it is in the Disneyland area it is in great shape.  Carpets look nice and clean.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast is what you would expect, the first day we were there they didn't even have eggs.  They have the typical cereal and pastries, scrambled eggs and sausage patties, waffle maker, fruit and toast.  The breakfast area is kept very clean and is large enough to accommodate the amount of guests.  The down side of this hotel is the fact that it is a 15 minute walk to Disneyland, they do not have a shuttle.  Also because we stayed there for a RunDisney event we wish we had known in advance that they were not on the shuttle list, nor were they willing to provide us with anything to eat
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad to hear you liked our staff. Our entire staff works hard to provide you with a pleasant stay. We look forward to see you next time you stay in Anaheim. Thank you for staying with us. we appreciate your business.

Summary: Location was perfect for this trip.  We had a car and did not need a shuttle to Disney.  It is right off the 5 freeway so it was very convenient.  Our room faced the freeway so it was a little loud at times, but not really bothersome.  If  you are a light sleeper you might want a room facing the parking lot.  Beds were comfy and came with four pillows each.  Very good selection of tv channels; fridge and microwave in room.  Fitness center was nice with an elliptical, treadmill, and a few other machines.  Also a tv, towels, water, and a/c controls.  Small pool is located outside.  Free breakfast includes:  toast, English muffins, various mini muffins/pastries, egg patty, sausage patty, make-it-yourself waffles, yogurt, hardboiled eggs, various cereals and oatmeal, fruit, coffee,
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad to hear you had a pleasant stay. Our breakfast offers a variety of selection for our guest to enjoy. We are glad to hear the location worked great for you and your family. We hope you choose us again anytime you visit Anaheim. Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your business.

Summary: We wanted a place to stay while visiting Disneyland, but just could not afford the price that Disney properties wanted.  So, we looked at Comfort Inn and Suites because we use them all the time while traveling.  We found an excellent room at about a fifth of what Disney wanted!  The room was large and comfortable with a refrigerator and microwave.  Breakfast is included and while it does not have the extent of other Comfort Inn and Suites (no yogurt and it was sausage everyday instead or rotating in bacon), it is still quite a bargain.  It is about a 12 minute walk to Disney from the hotel and the way is well lighted.  Thus, even though we came back after closing several nights at Disneyland, we felt safe and had no issues.  Parking is included (not covered) and we had no issues
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We are glad the to hear our hotel had what you were looking for. The rooms are clean and our staff are very friendly. Our entire team works hard to make sure you have an pleasant stay. We look forward to see you on your next visit to Anaheim. We appreciate your business.

Summary: This is now the 5th time we've stayed at the property over the last few years. The (complimentary) breakfast area and lobby has had a facelift since our last stay in 2012. We like it because its easily accessible with a rental car, reasonably priced for the vicinity and is clean and presentable. On past trips we have walked over to Disneyland (a light 15 min stroll) but this time (with elderly parents in tow) we drove a few minutes into the Disneyland carpark and caught the shuttle to drop us off closer to the gates. Would definitely stay again. Rooms on the opposite side to the freeway have good views of the nightly fireworks display.
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  Thank you so much for the compliments , we were happy to hear that you like our property , location and the staff. we would love to have you back near future. Happy Holidays.

Summary: We arrived early and they allowed us a early check-in which was nice. The front desk was very helpful and informative. The pool was heated and a great temperature.It is conveniently located to everything The breakfast was great. I will  stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest , We are glad you like the location of our property and Front desk staff and our pool . We would love to see you back near future.

Summary: We stayed at the this Comfort Inn from the 12th to the 15th of December for the sole purpose of visiting Disneyland. We were traveled with 3 children aged 7 months, 2 years and 5 years.  The good: The room was very clean and felt current. The room included a refrigerator (very hand for keeping snacks for the park fresh) and microwave. Complimentary breakfast included waffles, sausage patties, eggs, various juices, coffee and tea, oatmeal, etc. I heard no exterior noise, but you never know, maybe we just had considerate neighbors. Did not interact with staff that much but they were very polite. The price was the biggest plus. We have stayed at hotel's within walking distance of the park and been very happy with them as well, but for what we saved by staying further away, we were
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us. we appreciate your compliments about the breakfast and the hotel itself. We understand that you had a hard time commuting from our hotel to Disneyland however for your future visits we will like for you to consider a taxi service; they can accommodate your family. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad to hear everything else worked great for you.

Summary Heading: Always a great place to stay
Summary: We love staying here when we go to Disneyland. It is a fee minutes drive to the park. There is free wifi, lots of free parking for guests, and a great free breakfast spread. The rooms are always clean and great staff.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. Its great to know everything was convenient for you. We look forward to see you in the near future. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: We are repeat customers for a reason
Summary: This is our second time to this hotel, and if anything it has improved since my last glowing  review.   Friendly, accommodating staff, clean rooms, clean bathrooms, renovated front entry with an updated breakfast self serve.  The breakfasts could still be improved with including items like bacon and yogurts, but the waffle makers are the bomb.  Fresh fruit offered, great coffee.  Free parking, great beds and bedding.  We will be back next time we go to disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. Your feedbacks are important to us, our team works hard to provide you with a great experience. We look forward to see you in the near future.

Summary: I stayed at Comfort Inn during my visit to Disneyland.  It's very close to the Magic Kingdom and several restaurants like Bubba Gump and IHOP.  It's not the most updated hotel.  Breakfast was ok.  Room was ok.  The price was ok.  It's right off Interstate 5--which makes it convenient for visiting other local attractions.  I may stay here again.  You can probably find a better hotel--but be prepared to spend more money.  Overall, it was a 3 star stay!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for staying with us.  Feedback from our guests is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay.  Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel numerous times and always enjoy it. Room is always clean, bed always comfortable. Fridge and microwave in room used often. We stay either when going to Disneyland or when going on a cruise leaving from nearby Long Beach. Have used fitness room and enjoy the hot breakfast every morning. I don't hesitate to recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. Your feedback  is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay.  Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.  Farzana Kakar

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, very large clean rooms, friendly and helpful staff at front desk.
Summary: I stayed here for 7 nights while on vacation to Disneyland. This hotel is very close to the Disney properites but in traffic it does take a while to get to Disneyland parking lots. The traffic is very heavy and navigation is not so easy. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful with helping me find the best way to get back and forth from the airport to the the hotel as well as transportation to Disney. Check in here is 3 pm and they mean it. My flight arrived in the morning and I was at the hotel just before noon and although I had called ahead requesting early check in, I still had to wait until 3 pm for my room. The area the hotel is in did not feel safe for me to walk alone although I did make several trips across the street to Del Taco. I was meeting a friend here and we had
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us. Unfortunately we cannot garantee early check in. During the time that you stayed with us the hotel had been sold out, for that reason we were not able to check you in early. Your feedback is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay.  Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.  Kind regards,  Farzana Kakar

Summary: Absolutely never book with this hotel. Horrible customer service. Made a mistake in the dates for my reservation that was over 3 weeks away. I called them 5 minutes later and they refused to change it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations.

Summary: We arrived on the 7th sept from a long haul flight and were able to check in super  early ( 10am) thanks to our travel agent for emailing them to advise. Room was a nice size. We had a king size bed, fridge in room this was handy as it was extremely hot outside. Aircon was amazing and kept room nice and cool. Front reception have safes to keep documents safe. We had a view of the disney fireworks at night which go off around 9pm every day. Breakky was great and fills u up for a big day ahead. Free parking is a bonus. Pool was relaxing after big days at the theme parks.  Staff were friendly and accommodating. Some may need to research areas though when asked for the closest pharmacy or walmart they were unsure which to advise or if we could use public transport to get there. By
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We very much appreciate and value your feedback and will share it with our team.  Your survey responses will serve as encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services to provide an exceptional experience for our guests.  It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely,  Farzana Kakar General Manager Comfort Inn & Suites 714-772-8713

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights, not a very nice area, lots of crazys at shops next door,about a 25min walk to disney, on last day checked out of room and they  secure/held my luggage for a few hours untill transfer arrived and they lost our bags,they had been removed from the locked room by staff, they had given my luggage with my name clearly marked to someone else,luckly they found and contacted that person to return my bags,was so upsetting and stressful while I waited for them to b returned, eventually they came back, I asked for the manager of the hotel to contact me the next morning when she came in but she did not call.the girls on desk said whoops sorry but nothing we cab do,i would not recommend this hotel at all
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.  Sincerely,  Farzana Kakar General Manager Comfort Inn & Suites 714-772-8713

Summary: I'm going to base this review on facilities, closeness to Disney, comfort, cleanliness and cost. First of all the hotel has pretty much everything you need, such as free parking, pool, gym, free breakfast, ice machines, microwave and fridge (great for chilling your drinks to take to the park) in your room, plus the wifi is actually quite good. As others have said the hotel is around 1 mile from Disney, but be warned that if you decide to park at Disney, you could end up being put at the back of Simba lot, which is actually around the same distance from the hotel and there are no shuttles to take you to the entrance on this lot, they still have the nerve to charge you $17 for this privilege though. The bed in the room is a King and is really comfortable and there is a really
Manager Response: Dear Guest , Thank you for your response. We are glad you like the location and everything about our hotel.  In Future stay you can request the view side room. we hope to see you near future.

Summary Heading: average hotel, have seen small improvements over the years
Summary: I have been staying at this hotel annually for several years now. The renovated breakfast area is great. The rooms are slowly getting better and closer to the upper end of Comfort Inn hotels in the USA. The front desk is of variable friendliness and helpfulness. Hotel cleanliness and amenities are adequate. Parking is free which is a HUGE benefit in this area. It is a bit of a trek, but you can walk to Disneyland or the Convention Center from here. There are ART buses which can take you anywhere you want to go (for a fee).
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you had a great stayed. We hope to see you soon

Summary Heading: Nice Place to Stay Within Walking Distance of Disneyland!
Summary: This is the second time we stayed here while visiting Disneyland. It takes 15 minute to walk there, which we did for our 3 day stay. Great full breakfast included. Rooms are comfortable and clean. The price was perfect for our budget. Highly recommend this place. The staff is awesome as well!
Manager Response: Dear Guest , thank you for staying with us and take the time to write a review. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: We needed a hotel for an overnite stop prior to picking up a college student the next morning at UC Irvine.  This hotel was perfect.  It is immediately by the Katella off ramp from I-5.  So no searching through city streets  (even with a GPS) at nite.  Even though it was very close to the freeway, we did not hear any traffic, and we were on the freeway side.  When checking in, we saw the fireworks at Disneyland.  Room was clean and beds were comfortable.  After a soak in the spa, we had a good sleep.  Breakfast was excellent and the price was right....free!  Same for parking.  Great place for families visiting the happiest place on earth.  Only complaint, was that check-in was a little slow.
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  Thank you for the compliments on our location and Hotel itself. We are at good location by FWY 5 , of course we are near by the Disneyland at the Happiest place in the world. We are also near convention center , Honda Center ,Angels Stadium and near by University too. Near future we will hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: So close to Disneyland, you could almost walk!!
Summary: We booked our stay at this hotel prior to leaving The UK, and did so purely on cost, and its proximity to Disneyland! we had admittedly come from a hotel the previous night that wasn't great, and The Comfort Inn & Suites, Anaheim was like a breath of fresh air. It was clean, well presented, and the staff were really nice (even more so given the late hour we arrived!) We were checked in quickly, and given keys to our room, which was overlooking the intersection, with a view of that evening's Firework Display at Disneyland. We stayed two nights, taking advantage of the hotel's complimentary breakfast buffet both days, which was well stocked, with ample seating, and no waiting (again, great!!) Our room had coffee making facilities, and more coffee, milk and cups available next to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your Compliments about our Hotel . We are glad you like everything about our hotel & location. Our Staff does work very hard to keep our guest very happy.  Near future we hope to see you again .

Summary: I guess what you would expect near Disneyland but a over used hotel. worn carpet, chairs, bathrooms and bed. Spiders in room but it was clean. Staff at front desk were very nice and accommodating but this hotel needs a remake.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are glad you like our friendly staff and the hotel. We do upgrades our hotel periodically every year. We will hope to see you soon.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 1 night during a quick stop in Anaheim.  The location is close to everything Anaheim.  We went to Disneyland and it was literally a 5 minute drive and we were in the parking lot.  The hotel is very clean and the rooms are large.  The breakfast was good and food was plentiful.  Additionally, the staff was friendly and helpful.  We would definitely stay here again if we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest , Thank you for staying with us. Few upgrade & updates you think we need , we will forward this suggestion to our main office . we always do updates our rooms, we just change lamps in all of our rooms to just let you know. We are glad you like our front desk staff .   Thank you,

Summary: When you are looking for early morning entry into Disneyland you would like to stay in this hotel.  With clean rooms, bedroom and quick breakfast you should be in Disneyland by 9am to cover most of the rides.  AC is in the room needs up gradation and breakfast menu needs to be enhanced.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad you like the hotel  & breakfast . Thanks for letting us know about A/C. we will check that out, did you let the front desk  know about your A/C . we have Maintenance person would have check it for you.

Summary: I stayed one night at the Comfort Inn & Suites in Anaheim the night before attending the D23 Expo on Sunday, August 16.  The room was very comfortable and the breakfast was good.  Check in and check out were handled by the excellent front desk staff.  The location was very convenient to the Anaheim Convention Center.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are glad you like our location & our hotel. we will be glad to see you again near future,

Summary: We stayed at the Anaheim Comfort Inn and was quite please with our stay. The rooms were clean but very noisy because our room was right next to the Freeway. There were not enough breakfast for all guests staying at the hotel.   When I come home, my trouble began. The hotel had charged me for an extra night. And I tried to mail as well as call them several times. But every time they promised to refund my money, they just simply forgot. When I called then 4th time, the receptionist was even rude. Now, I have made my bank cancel the payment and after a month I will get my money back. But please, a real lousy treatment indeed. I will never stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  We try to reach you , your voicemail is full ,  you can call back to us at our hotel we can resolved your problem

Summary: Good beds and bedding.  Very quiet, no street or hall noise- we had top floor. Outdoor pool was really nice and just the right temp.  Bath area good and TV also.  Breakfast area large. Only draw back was we had a reservation for 2 queens on top floor.  Initially, the desk clerk assigned us a King not on top floor.  After we went to room and discovered this, we went back down and different clerk quickly gave us the 2 queens we booked for and on top floor and all was well.
Manager Response: Dear Guest.  Thank you for staying with us,

Summary: We stayed here while visiting Disneyland Resort.  The rooms were clean and the front desk was friendly.  The main breakfast was sausage patties and scrambled eggs all 3 mornings.  Parking was tight but manageable.  There is only one entrance/exit to the hotel and it is in an awkward spot for getting in and out of the lot.  Overall not a bad place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are happy that you like our hotel & breakfast .

Summary Heading: It was a Good stay, but there are concerns
Summary: The Good  This hotel is clean and the rooms are nice. The breakfast has more option that most, and they keep the food coming. The Staff is wonderful, we really appreciate Ami at the front desk. They also have free Wifi. The pool area is very well kept, it was a lot of fun for the entire family.  The Bad  This is not in the best area. We had a lot of homeless people walking around. There are also some apartments that don't have the nicest crowd. When we went on a walk we were a little worried about out travels.  Not sure we would stay here again. Just because to the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for letting us know that you like our Hotel. About Homeless people city of Anaheim working on that situation. About RV Home & Apartments  that beyond our control.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, not so great area
Summary: Lovely Hotel, great rooms, all you need, very clean and nice and spacious.  Lovely staff very accommodating and nothing to much trouble to help you.  Building is a very nice building, plenty of car parking.  Is next to the highway so if you don't like looking at a freeway ask for the other side which also gives you views of Disney Fireworks at night (which we didn't know until after the fact unfortunately, but then again I suppose someone has to stay on that side.  The total negative for this lovely Hotel unfortunately is the area, it is next to not a very good place a few homeless people which may freak some,  The local shops next door has a great donut shop yum.  Hotel doesn't have its own shuttle, there is a bus stop up the road to go to Disney, but I would suggest a taxi
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your response.

Summary Heading: As the name suggests, it is very comfortable!
Summary: We stayed here for our trip to Disneyland, and to go whale watching in Newport Beach.  A few things; the cleaning staff did an outstanding job.  Our room was immaculate, and I mean IMMACULATE.  Our room was always pristine clean, and the beds were beyond comfortable.  Yes, the AC is loud, but we were so knocked out from Disney that we didn't hear a thing.  The breakfast was nice, and Anna at the front desk was extremely helpful when I mentioned I didn't want to use the co-op laundry next door (the hotel is in a nice area, but as with ANY area, there were some shady characters around the marketplace next door).  She printed out a list of nearby laundromats, and we actually found a great one in Newport Beach (Alpine Cleaners, if anyone is interested).  Regarding the ART shuttle;
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  We are very glad you like the Room & service. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: our family travelled from north to have a wonderful experience staying at this motel with  a very kind and helpful receptionists atzimba chavez and amna akbar.the free wi fi help us a lot to communicate with friends and relatives all over conveniently close to restaurant shopping malls and disneyland rooms are well looked after by the housekeeper we will recommend the motel for a place to stay and enjoy
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your kind words , They both are wonderful with guest service.

Summary: We are East Coasters and we were in Las Vegas for a family reunion.  We decided to take the 4 hour drive to Anaheim and visit Disneyland.  This hotel was convenient to the Interstate and Disneyland.  We prepaid so all we had to pay when we got to the hotel was a $1 per night resort fee.  This seems a little silly...  The room was quiet, clean, and we had a view of the Disney fireworks!!  The only disappointment was the hotel did not provide transportation to the parks, so we had to park at the designated Disneyland parking and take Disney transportation to the parks for $17 per day.
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  We are happy that you like our hotel. About Destination Fee that is from city of Anaheim , everyone pays for it. 3rd party Reservation they don't charge you so we charge the guest when they come here. Anaheim Resort Transit is from city if Anaheim they do not have shuttle stop at our hotel , you can catch it from near by hotel , take cab for $10 going & coming back is $ 7 ,otherwise guest park it at Disneyland Parking fee $17 .

Summary: Came with my Mom and Aunt for a California experience.  We wanted to stay near Disneyland and drive anywhere else we went. Living in Pittsburgh,  PA we knew nothing about California.  I read many reviews on many sites and decided on this hotel. At first check in, it's a little overwhelming because it's right by a major freeway, so it's always busy and noisy. When we first got in our room, I thought it smelled like cat pee but my Mom and Aunt smelled nothing. I still called the front desk to see if animals had been in that room and they assured me none had been and some people think the carpet cleaning stuff smells odd. So, ok, by the next morning it was gone. The room was a typical room. 2 double beds, microwave,  small fridge, little desk, little chair, and we paid $10 more per
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Somewhat predictable, but not too bad. Average.
Summary: I ended up staying here as a result of looking it up on a hotel app on my phone. Needless to say, it was not trip advisor. The place was a little difficult to find. But, once we got here, we were so tired, that we just went to the rooms and fell sleep. I don't remember much about anything. The room was average. The sleep was average. The quietness was average. Not much to remember… It won't be my choice of hotel in the future…
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  Thank for staying with us.

Summary: just got back, hotel great large spacious queensize room  very comfy beds, our room had good view of disneys fireworks displays of a night.  quick check in/out.  breakfast was very good bread/muffins/waffle machines to make you own waffles, cereal,eggs sausages ,fruit,etc tea coffee plenty to start your day, disney was about 20 mins walk.  plenty of restaurants in walking distance cheesecake factory, pizzas, chinese irish bar and many more.  never used the pool but it looked fine to chill out at after a long day in the parks would definatly stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are glad you like our Hotel with all amenity  & breakfast . we would be glad to have you back.

Summary: We go to see the Angles play in Anaheim several times a year.  We have stayed at several properties.  We have paid top dollar.  We have seen that when you are choosing a hotel near Disney land.  Price will not buy you quality.  This hotel is within walking distance from Disneyland and almost close enough to walk to Anaheim stadium. It is also the best of all. Not just cost, but clean, secure and great aminities. Work out.  Business center, handicap friendly including pool and hot tub.  Having stayed many times we will end our search and trust history.  It is next to freeway and lots of kid's.  Room's are quite and muffle most of the noise.  A.C. drowns the rest. Fridge, microwave, in room coffee.  Full  buffet breakfast that is typical of Comfort Inn's.  Large breakfast area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad you like our hotel & staff  everything about it. We are looking forward to serving you near future also.   Thank you,

Summary Heading: Booking in advance has its disadvantages!
Summary: Seems like the fact that I paid and reserved the room with instructions about noise almost two months in advance backfired.  When I got there (only an hour after the beginning of check-in time), the receptionist told me that they are full and she has put me away from the elevator and ice-machine but right next to the freeway and that if there is a problem with noise,she may be able to change the room the next day (really? who wants to keep changing their room during the stay? 2 month notice is not enough?) . On top of that, I realized later that night when I came in to my room that the AC was not working.  They fixed the AC the next day but I stayed in the room with the noise from the freeway...
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Visited this hotel after getting a great AAA rate. My boyfriend and I stayed here while visiting Disneyland and an Angels game. The location is close enough. The pool was good enough. Clean with good air conditioning. The only complaint was we rushed back from Huntington Beach to get ready for the baseball game and it was 6pm. When we got to the room the maid was cleaning and another maid jumped in the room with a vacuum. Now it's nice to see how hard she was working to clean the room, but at 6pm? When we were out all day. I politely told them they didn't have to finish since we had to get ready and leave. They left without an issue. I think I would stay here again. Very comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: This was our first stay at the Comfort Inn, Disneyland Resort. I can't exactly say that it was an A+ experiance. The bathroom had mold on the ceiling, the carpets felt a bit grimey in spots, and the room was a bit musty smelling; most like becasue of the humidity. The parking is free which is a bonus. However they do charge a silly $1 per night fee, because the are "resort close to Disneyland" I think they are a bit mistaken on being close. And yes this hotel is right up against the I-5 freeway there is constant noise from it. So if noise is a issue you for you pay the extra for a "city view" room, sleep with earplugs, or stay somewhere else. Word of caution, watch your credit card and its charges when you stay here too!  There is not a bus stop near the hotel either about a 15
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for satying with us.

Summary: Stayed here again for a visit to Disneyland. This was our fifth time staying at this hotel; second time when Disneyland was the main event. It is close to the freeway and due to divided roads may require that you flip a U Turn to get to the property. Beds are clean and comfortable when you get done at Disneyland. The breakfast room is large, well stocked but busy with other travelers and lots of kids. This is to be expected of a family destination. The pool and hot tub are rarely busy because families are at Disneyland or crashed out after a long day. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear GUEST,  Thank you so much for staying with us.

Summary: We stayed here 1 night until we could find another hotel near Disney that was less expensive (this was $149).  We booked it the day of, so we didn't mind paying extra.  The hotel is nicely updated.  We appreciate the free wifi in room, fridge & microwave in room, and speaking of rooms they were clean (and had a great shower head).  We could see fireworks from disneyland from our window - that was cool.  We used the nice business center, and got tacos from the restaurant across the street and ate in their nice lobby.  They put out breakfast at 6:30am, right when we were leaving.  If the room had been a little less, we would have stayed here another 3 nights (we moved to the Holiday Inn which was also nice but less expensive).
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are very happy you enjoyed staying with us.   Thank you

Summary: We stayed here for one night. We were hardly here. After spending 14 hours at Disneyland, a quick 5 minute drive here at midnight and we all crashed. The beds were comfy, the bathroom spacious and clean. We slept in so we didn't get to check out the free breakfast. It would definitely be a comfortable stay for more than one night. There was a mini fridge and microwave. If you don't have a vehicle there is a bus stop not too far up that will take you to Disneyland for $5 per person .
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are glad you like our hotel , enjoy your stayed with us.

Summary Heading: Good for the money and fairly close to Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for my daughters birthday and Disneyland trip. Room was adequate for our needs. No safe box but thats ok. Only gripe was 1 of 2 bedsheets had something nasty on it. Very disconcerting especially when you're burned out from the days activities and just wanna rest up.   Breakfast was ok. They had waffles, sausage, toast and jam, cereal, banana. Good enough to get your day started.  Would I stay here again?! Yes! Despite one small detail overlooked, it could happen to anyone and shouldnt detract from staying. Btw, called front desk and they took care of it! Overall experience was pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We stayed here due to its location between Disneyland and the sports venues. We walked to our destinations (walking times: Honda Center - 40 minutes, Angel Stadium - 30 minutes, Disney entrance - 30 minutes).  The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was a typical hotel room. If you want to use the mini-frig, you must turn it on. It is off to save energy (great idea).  There is a nice sized fitness center with 2 treadmills, an elliptical, riding bike and 2 weight machines. The pool and Jacuzzi is outdoors.
Manager Response: Dear Guest ,  Thank you for staying with us. I' m glad you had good time staying with us. we look forward to serving your  future lodging needs.  Thank you, Farzana

Summary Heading: Single night visit and a baseball game...
Summary: Our first and most important requirement was met....the room was clean. The hotel is conveniently located between Disneyland and Angels stadium. On first arriving, I pulled under the covered drive, looking for the front door. There is no signage saying "Lobby" or "Registration" to indicate this is where you check in. When we did check in, the clerk who registered me was very friendly and professional.  After a long drive to get there, and an exciting baseball game, we slept good. The bed was comfortable and the room was cool enough, even though the ac unit was a bit loud.  The only negatives was the foot stool for the easy chair was noticeably stained, and the hair dryer did not work.  The rate was reasonable considering peak period, and would stay there again.  Didn't get a
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us.  I hope you had fun at the game.  We look forward to you coming and staying with us again for another game.  Farzana

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and convenient.
Summary: Nice clean rooms, super friendly staff and a decent breakfast option. Arrived early and was able to check in. That was a huge bonus as we didn't want to drive around sightseeing with all of our luggage. I cannot stress how helpful and friendly the staff is at this location. Just wonderful. A couple of Disney tips. Cheaper to take a taxi of you have more than three in your group and buy tickets there, cheaper than online. Two thumbs way up for this location!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us and I am happy to hear that you had a wonderful time.  We hope to have you come back and stay with us again soon.  Farzana

Summary Heading: Family  of  7,  Two  rooms  on a budget !
Summary: Very  kind  staff,   AAA  rate  was great. Free  breakfast  was  nice and offered  a nice  variety,  toast , waffles ,sausage,  eggs, fruit, cereal,  etc.... saved time  and money, room  was  super  clean  and  service  was  great! needed  extra  blanket  at 1:00AM , delivered  within  10 min. Front desk  staff were  very  kind  and  helpful, we parked at the  Disney  Toy story  parking  lot  for  $ 17 then caught  the  park shuttle , it's  about  a 20 minutes  walk to  the  park  there is a tacky liquor  store  next  door  and the  quest  parking  lot  has a retaining  wall  separating  the  lot from  a older  looking  trailer  park,  few homeless  people  at the  city bus stop  down  the  street,  we had  no  problems.  We were  a group  of  7 so  it  was  cheaper  to drive  a
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am happy that you liked the property and the staff.  I am also happy that you got the items you needed.  We hope to have you come back soon and thank you for staying with us.  Farzana
