Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am glad you had a great stay. Found the rooms to be good and the staff to be helpfull. Thank you for taking time to comment about it on line.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Comfort Inn was in an excellent location about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland. The rooms were spacious, the queen beds very comfortable and free wifi in the room. Nice free breakfast comprising of cereal, waffles, muffins etc but disappointed there weren't any bagels. The reception staff were very helpful. Lots of diners nearby and also good shopping such as Brea Mall and Outlets at Orange. Went to Huntington Beach for the day which was about 30 minutes away and was a really nice beach to go to. Also drove to Hollywood, parking in the Highland Center. Quite scary when we came out of the center as there were people dressed up as various characters to have a photo with who demanded money when the picture was taken and one guy was quite aggressive when we didn't give him as much as
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am glad you had such a wonderful time.  I like the tour as well and had a good time.  We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: This hotel was clean, up-to-date, and had all we needed in amenities. The price was low and the room was very nice. We also enjoyed the free breakfast and ample parking. If you are in great shape, and not older, like us, you could likely save the parking price and walk into Disneyland from here.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and commenting about it on line.  I am glad to hear that you found it quite pleasant. We hope you will stay again in the near future.

Summary: Finishing second night at Comfort Inn on Katella.  Fantastic!  Rooms are great, AC works fine, beds are very comfortable, and breakfast is out of this world (waffle maker and sausage/eggs to name a few).  One hint:  It is about 1.3 miles walking to Disney, so if you have little ones, suggest taxi, bus, or something else.  Once you walk to the park, walk around ALL DAY, the walk can be a little long.  Other than that, this is a great hotel in every respect.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I agree take the taxi or better yet the city offers a shuttle service to and from the park.  I am glad to hear that you had a great time with us and enjoyed it and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel is a great value, conveniently located near Disneyland and many good places to eat.  Smoking free, clean rooms, good breakfast, and above all, a friendly staff.  When I called to inquire about the charger for my ipad that I thought I left behind, I found out that I had not only left the charger, but some portable speakers along with a whole drawer full of clothes and whatnot.  Jennifer arranged to have my effects delivered to my office here in Phoenix, which not only saved me the cost of replacing my equipment, but spared me a lot of embarassment (since I was the one charged to do the last pass to make sure nothing was left behind).  Thank you Jennifer!  This was our second year at the hotel and we will be back next year.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for responding about your recent stay with us.  I am glad that were able to help and I hope everything reached your location.  I hope that you make it back a 3rd time real soon.

Summary: Stayed only 2 nights at this off Disney property. First off, this hotel had large rooms, and a very comfy king sized bed. They have a great pool that we never had time for, but it looked really nice. They also have free parking, no rip off resort fees, and a free breakfast. The rate at this hotel was perfect as well. We had our own car and got to the parks within 15 minutes. There are plenty of offsite places to shop, and dine that were close to this hotel. The staff was very friendly and accomodating. Our room had a little noisy but ice cold A/C which was nice to sleep. Check in/out was very easy. Beware there are no safes in the rooms. They do have a limited amount of safety deposit boxes at the front desk. Overall, our stay was perfect, even though we are huge Disney fans,
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for commenting about your stay.  I am so glad to hear that you had a wonderful time with us and you vacation was great.  You found that staff to be friendly and helpful.  We did better then you expected and thats great.  We hope to see you soon and serve your future lodging needs.

Summary: We had some business to attend to at the Disneyland Hotel, and wanted to stay within a budget, so the Comfort Inn was the perfect solution. The check-in/check-out was smooth, quick and courteous, and the room was immaculate! I loved that there was a fridge and microwave in the room, as well as free internet, HBO and lots of electrical outlets. I was able to get some additional work done in the room with no problems! If I needed a printer, they have a small business center downstairs for our use, free of charge. The pool looked nice (even though I didn't have time to enjoy it!), and so did the fitness center. The breakfast they served in the morning was inviting and filling (eggs, sausage, waffles, etc.). I would definitely return to this hotel next time I have business in the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us and commenting on line.  I glad to hear that your stay with us was wonderful. We love it when guest have a good time and would like to stay with us again.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: I'm glad we chose that hotel
Summary: When we arrived at the hotel, we were greeted by a lady called farzana ( lovely lady wi a lovely name), she made us feel welcomed.  PROS: -the room is very very clean and spacious, we booked a room with double queen beds, the beds are so comfy to sleep on  -the bathroom is ultra clean with updated decor, loved the bathroom alot, and they put complimentary toiletteries every day ( shampoo, conditioner, soap and body lotion) - the hotel is so quiet, since most of the guests, like us, are spending the whole day in disneyland and returning to the hotel exhausted and just want to have a good night sleep which we did in every night we spent at the hotel -breakfast is served daily, a basic continental breakfast -there is a shuttle service from the hotel to disneyland resort which runs
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for going on line and commenting about your stay with us.  I am glad to hear that you had a wonderful experience.  I do hope that you will come back soon and we look forward to seeing you.

Summary: We stayed from 05/07/2013 through 05/11/2013. The room was very clean. Beds very comfortable.  Staff was very friendly.    Very close to all the "fun" - but not right in the middle of it. Which is good for traffic reasons.  I would recommend this hotel - and if we ever make it back to California - will for sure stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for commenting on line and give us a great review.  I am thrilled that you had a wonderful stay and would love to come back when you are in California again.  We would love to see you again.

Summary Heading: Don't stay here, they will charge your card for unauthorized charges!!!!!
Summary: Stood at this hotel May 5-9th, 2013. The room was average and the carpet in the room was worn and stained. This is a budget hotel so I was not expecting much. The breakfast was below average compared to other Choice Hotels I stood at, no yogurt, tasteless danishes, and old fruit. The pool on the website stated it was heated but it was not. The tv reception would cut in and out at times and one of the lights in the room would flicker on even when it was turned off. The shower faucet got stuck on three different times. There was a tear in one of the comforters. We were there for Disneyland and were barely in the room except to sleep and shower.  I have stood at many Choice Hotels and never had any issues till this hotel. I returned home from my vacation to have a message on my
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We strive very hard to make sure each and every guest has a enjoyable stay with us.  We order food 3 times a week to make sure it is as fresh as possible.  If there is any issues with the rooms we tell guest to please call us so that we can take care of it right away.  We want to make sure our guests enjoy their vacation.  We put brand new bedding in that day for all the rooms.  Our house keepers check each and every thing before it is put in the room. I understand you felt that you were charged unreasonably, however the reason you had been charged was because it was brand new and we have signs that say if it is ruined or taken we charge.  We do our best to treat and take care of each and every guest with respect and fairness.  We never charge unless it is needed and we always inform the guest.

Summary: This hotel was clean and comfortable, with the exception of the chaos at breakfast! Breakfast was nothing special. My room however, had  problem with the phone - the phone would beep with the message light blinking at weird times of the night. I had mentioned this to the fron desk on several occasions on my 3 night stay but I was still disturbed all 3 nights. With little kids in the room, it is impossible to go back to bed once they are up - the front desk did not seem to be concerned and offered no sympathy or even change my room.  We had 2 rooms booked in total but the staff seemed lease interested in sorting my issue. The rooms were not cheap but I think they can get away with this because its the location! Disneyland is a short drive.  I was also charged $10 to get a room
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am sorry to hear that you had some issues with the room and were also miss informed about the fireworks.  Disney only does them if they are open late.  We have 2 sides to the hotel and 1 side we do charge more, not for the fire works but because it is an upgrade.  I do hope that you will give us another try and we look foward to seeing you again.

Summary: Stayed here with family for three nights during spring break.  Checked in around 1 in the morning with no problems.  Front desk staff friendly.  The location is ideal right off freeway. Walked to Disneyland once..about 20 min.  There is a bus that stops right next to the hotel that will take you to Disney for five dollars a day round trip..very easy runs every 20 min.  The breakfast was fine. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the wonderful comments.  I am glad that the front desk helped you and that you had a great stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you in the near future.

Summary: We recently spent two nights at this hotel while staying near Disneyland! This is a wonderful hotel and wonderful value if you are planning to stay in the Disney area without shelling out an arm and a leg. The beds were wonderful the bathroom was huge and the entire place was very clean. The breakfast is the standard affair.. nothing to fancy but will do for most people. Hotel staff was very friendly and very helpful! We would definitely stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to go on line and comment.  Feedback from our guests is very important to us and your input helps with our continuing efforts to provide excellent service and a great stay.  Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.  Kind Regards,

Summary: Went to Disneyland after Christmas. Originally booked the Little Blue Boy Motel, but the room was horrible, stains on the sheets and smelt a lot like smoke in a non smoking room, left there that same night and lost 65 dollars for the night since they didn't want to issue a refund. Went looking for another room to stay but everywhere was booked. The staff at Comfort Inn, Mercedes and Dena were Glad to help me with getting a Great Room. Best Stay I ever had in a Motel or Hotel. Wife and kid didn't want to leave the room to go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for commenting and I am glad to hear that we were able to help on such short notice.  Our housekeepers do their best to keep the rooms clean and keep the property clean.  We will keep an eye out for you and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights in March. Had an extremely late arrival. Lady at the desk(Mercedes) was great! Originally I had booked 2 nights but added a 3rd with a separate reservation(I had done the prepaid thing). She got me checked in for both reservations so I didn't have to check out and then recheck in. Had a room with 2 queens. Room was a nice size and clean. Beds were comfortable. Did not hear any freeway noise although I did keep the fan running on the ac because I like noise. 10min drive to disneyland parking--not because of distance, but traffic. Traffic lights are very long. Awesome complimentary breakfast. Excellent value!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for commenting on helpful our front desk was to you.  We do our best to help our guests in anyway we can.  I am glad to hear that we were able to help you and make for smooth check in and stay.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Awesome and will certainly stay again!
Summary: This motel has a lot of advantages.  Clean rooms, good breakfast, very helpful hints and advice from the front desk gals (Amna and Karla). They both wernt above and beyond what we expected and explained how we were able to board shuttle to Disneyland from the motel as well as gave us directions to nice/affordable restaurants (Red Robin, Joe's Crab Shack, Outback, etc). We had our whole family (17) there..4 rooms/4nights and will for sure go back! Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you and our staff thanks you.  We try to make sure the front desk is able to answer all most all of your guests questions and to help the guest in anyway they may need it.  I am so glad to hear that they were able to help you and beyond.  That makes for a great stay and a returning guest and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: OK stay but far better last time
Summary: We stayed in this hotel in August and it was wonderful, unfortunately this time we did not have the same experience.  All of the vending machines on each floor were out of water, soda, and other beverages. When we told the front desk about this they said that they knew but we were still out of luck.  We stayed for four nights and each time we went down for breakfast there was absolutely nothing left.  On a more positive note, the hotel was clean and the staff was very friendly.  We were accommodated and upgraded to the Cityview for free because we needed adjoining rooms for when our son arrived.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We do our best to keep things stocked.  We were very busy at the time you were here.  However we make sure things are stocked at all times and if they arent' we call and get them stocked.  The vending machine was reported and the company was called. The company came next day and the refilled it.  Thank you for commenting that the staff did help you with other things.  We look forward to serving you future lodging needs.

Summary: Myself and my partner stayed here for 8 nights and it was perfect. For the price you pay you defiantly get your moneys worth. We turned up a couple hours before check in and they let us straight in! It is a little bit on the outskirts of Anaheim, but you can catch the ART from the side of the hotel to Disneyland and where ever else you need to be. I would defiantly stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Again we try to make sure each guest requests are meant.  If we can we do your best to do just that.  I am glad to see that yours were taken care of.  I also am glad that when you come to this area again you will stay with us again.

Summary: I arrived an hour earlier then it said check in time was allowed, but they said they had a room ready and let me check in which was great, breakfast was good, free parking, liked fridge and micro in room, Bathroom could use slight redo, no ventilation for some reason.I didn't have any problems with staff.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments.  If we can we try to met all guest requests and needs.  I am glad that your was meant.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We had stayed here several times before and it was always adequate and a good value, so we were looking forward to staying here this past February 5-7.  The room was fine, but our problem was with the very unprofessional manager.  Our  first day there, my husband found a $10 bill in the elevator.  When we went to the front desk, all the manger could do was joke and ask my husband if he could go back to the elevator and look to see if there were any $20 bills.  I asked if she needed our name or room number and she said no.  On the last day when we were checking out, I figured I would check and see if anyone had claimed it, because if no one had, we felt it should be ours since we had been honest enough to turn it in.  The person at the front desk went and got the manager, who
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I understand that you had found money and wanted the rightful owner to have it back.  When you came to the front desk to ask if any one had picked it up you were told no.  You asked for it back and we gave it to you.  There was no issue of not wanting you to have it or not.  Our goal is make our guests feel comfortable.  If you felt that was not the case, that was not our intent.  All we did was just return the money to you.  As for the 10 being switched to, too 5's the manager just grabbed what we had in the drawer.  There was nothing meant by it.  I hope this does clear things up.  We do hope that whe you do decide to travel to our area that you will give us a call.

Summary: Great hotel, we arrived early approximately 9:00am and our room was available straight away. Room is equipped with a empty fridge, microwave & a comfy bed. Complimentary breakfast every morning- Such a large variety from eggs to waffles. About a ten minute walk from the hotel to Disney Land. Staff very friendly and helpful. Would recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments.  We try to make sure each guest arrives happy and leave happy. Our breakfast has really improved and thank you for acknowledging that. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We chose this hotel based on reviews, location, breakfast, and price.  The front desk staff were welcoming and helpful.  The breakfast was good.  Our room was spotless.  Bathrooms have been updated.  Our room was on the 5th floor, and we could see the fireworks each evening without heading to the park! The ART bus stop is right around the corner.  Route 12 takes you to the parks.  Garden Walk (lots of restaurants) is a short distance from the hotel. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you so much for enjoying your stay and commenting about it.  We work hard to keep the property clean and keep the guests happy.  I am glad you got to see the fireworks and I hope you can come back in the summer to enjoy more fireworks and the pool.

Summary: A two night stay at this hotel was good value and fairly well placed for Disneyland visit. Easy to find and free parking. The receptionists were lovely, even called our room ten minutes after we were in to check all was well. First time that has ever happened. They went out of their way to make sure we had everything we wanted. No sign of any problems other  reviewers had. No smells no malfunctioning bathrooms. Breakfast was pretty standard but it was included and was an adequate start to the day. The bed was comfortable and the bedding fresh. No complaints. It is not a five star hotel but good value in a very competitive market. A good twenty minute walk to Disneyland but in a good area and not sleepy. Close to good restaurants. All in all a good stay. No need to pay more
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for commenting about your recent stay with us.  I am glad to hear that it was pleasant and you found that it provided everything that you needed. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: I couldn't be more impressed with the accommodations and staff at the Disneyland Hotel. The grounds were beautiful, the pools fun for the kids. The location was the best part of this hotel. I would go back again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us and commenting about how wonderful your stay was.  We work hard throughout the property to ensure that it looks great. Thank you and we can’t wait to serve your future lodging needs.

Summary: Being so close to Disney I was afraid it'd be swarming with noisy kids, but it was very quiet and not very busy when we stayed. I very much enjoyed my stay here. The rooms were very nice, clean and quiet, much better than I expected. Very good selection for the continental breakfast too. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you so much for commenting on how wonderful your stay was and that it was beyond your expectations.  We want our guests to leave happy and wanting to come back.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Filthy, old rooms and a bonus...Unprofessional Management!! YAAY!
Summary: The furniture and rooms were old and dingey from the carpets to the chairs to the curtains but Im not to big of a hotel snob so I was willing to overlook some things however; the front desk clerk quoted us a room price without taxes when I booked the room over the phone.  I asked specifically what the total price of the room would be taxes included and she stated the room price only. When we checked our card statement we noticed the additional money.  I asked to speak to a manager over the phone and explained the situation.  I explained to the manager that I understood that the clerk made a mistake when quoting the room price but I expected the original price that I agreed upon over the phone to be honored.  The manager proceeded to lose her temper and tell me "well she meant to
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  All of our guests are told the same thing. We always quote with the words plus tax.  That goes for all guests.  As for your stay no one had gotten angry with any one and as a guest of the property we explained everything in detail about rates and the situation. When you checked out again you were told the same thing by the same person whom you talked to on the phone in a clear and very calm voice.  Since it is off season this is the best time to fix the pool that was maindated by the city. We are doing our best to improve the inside outside of the property.  We have updated the bedding and breakfast.  Guests love it here.  As you can see below we strive very hard to make our guests happy.

Summary: This hotel is a great value for being near Disneyland. The room was nice and clean, and we liked that is was a hotel not a motel. The continental breakfast was great. The only negative was the breakfast area was cramped and crowded. The staff working during breakfast was also less than friendly. I would definitely stay here again, and hope the staff was just having a bad day when we stayed.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for letting us know about your stay.  Our staff is friendly and not sure what happened that day but we work hard to be friendly and helpful. We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: Very nice hotel, clean and quiet if you get a room away from the highway side of the facility. King room was very clean but the air conditioner was above average in loudness. The provided breakfast was above average for this class of hotel with many choices as well as a nice fruit selection. Pool and spa were closed for renovation for all but the first day of our stay. I wish we would have known this in advance, we may have reconsidered our reservation here. Location was excellent and within walking distance (about a 15 minute stroll) to the Disney Parks. Many and varied restaurants were located nearby as well as the Garden Walk Mall, with more restaurants as well as many popular shopping venues. Within a 5 minute drive into Orange CA, is the Crystal Cathedral which is worth
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for commenting about your recent stay with us.  I am glad to hear that you liked the breakfast. We are centrally located to many attractions.  I hope that you give us a chance again for the pool and spa is soon to be opened.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights in July.  The hotel was chosen due to the location (close to the Angels Stadium and Interstate) and previous Trip Advisor reviews. The reception staff were very helpful and the housekeeping staff were excellent.  We had a spacious room on the top floor with 2 queen beds and there was still plenty of room for three large suitcases without falling over them!  We had a lovely view over the Angels Stadium and could watch the fireworks. (every Friday when the Angels play at home!).  The Angels stadium is within walking distance, (about 20 minutes) although coming back in the evening the road is poorly lit.  The pool area is quite small but as most hotel guests are visiting Disney (which is really close by) during the day it was virtually deserted.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your comments.  I understand that some things can be a bit of an issue.  However we try our best to make sure our guests feel comfortable and enjoy their stay with us. We are located where it is easy for you to get the angle stadium and Disneyland.  Breakfast can be tight but you are more than welcome to take it to your room.  We hope that you come back in the summer again for we have made some changes and I think you will enjoy.

Summary: Great place to stay; totally reasonable and within walking distance of Disney (about a 15 minute walk).  Breakfast was way better and more plentiful than we thought it'd be.  Rooms were wonderfully clean and well appointed.  The only downside was the front desk staff was kind of standoffish and not terribly welcoming upon our arrival; it seemed like asking for simple things (for example a room with two beds) was a hassle.  The staff when I booked on the phone was good.  Other than that, I'd recommend it and stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your comments. We like when guests let us know about things that are going on.  We do our best to make sure each and every guest is happy.  I do hope that you will give us a chance again and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: We visit the parks regularly and look for good but affordable places to stay that are close but not necessarily in walking distance. This is a great place to stay just outside of walking distance from the parks. (it is in walking distance to Anaheim Garden Walk with shops and good restaurants, Cheesecake Factory, PF Changs, Bubba Gump Shrimp Co., McCormick and Schmick Steaks etc.) The hotel does not look impressive from the outside, but it is clean and comfortable and the staff was pleasant. The beds were comfortable, the TV and desk, bathroom and furniture were all up to date and the free WiFi was good. The added bonus in the rooms was the small fridge and microwave. Previous reviews have said that the AC units are loud, they might be (no central air)... we didn't need to use
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I really like all that you had to say about us and I appreciate you taking time out and commenting about us.  Our pool in better now and I hope you can come in the summer to experience it.  We look forward to seeing you soon hopefully in the summer.

Summary: We stayed here for five nights and enjoyed it.  The check in process was fast and the fron desk staff was very friendly and knowledgable of the area.  The breakfast was the same for our entire stay, sausage, patty type eggs, donuts, sweet rolls, cereal, waffles, and more.  Still very tasty and great that it was included in our already reasonable priced room, along with free internet and parking.  Parking never seemed to be an issue with us. always seemed to be open spaces.  The room was very clean and comfortable.  We will definately be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us and will be coming back. We work hard to insure our guests have a wonderful stay.  Thank you so much and we will keep an eye out for you.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: We stayed there for 5 days and 4 nights and cost us approx $106 a night. Its about 6 blocks from Disneyland which was convenient. Checked in at 11pm and was serviced by a rude staff member who argued with us about our AAA discount. Breakfast is part of the deal and consisted of cereals, some breads, waffles, basic fruit, and "egg mcmuffin" type sausages and eggs (microwaved packages).Breakfast only served till 930am during weekdays, 10am on weekends. Beds were comfortable but heaters very loud and noisy. Pool and spa was fine but we did not expect much since most of our time was spent at Disneyland not the hotel. Daytime staff helpful and courteous. Parking free but limited as it filled up quickly, wi-fi also free. Coffee available all day. Recommend for families on budget who
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking time out to comment about your stay with us.  I see that for the most part your stay was a good one and that you would recommend others to come to us.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Good value if you don't need to be right near Disneyland
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here, the room was fine, beds comfortable. It was a bit of a walk to Disneyland but we didn't mind as we don't have small children. Breakfast was great . A good cheaper alternative than the precinct motels
Manager Response: Dear Guest, I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found the hotel meant with your expectations.  We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: Found what appeared to be a camera in the room, called front desk to complain. staff was unable to explain what the device was for and then became very rude and unprofessional with me when i told them i was not comfortable staying there, was told i would not be given any kind of refund if i left.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, You were told clearly by the front desk that the devise was for the remote.  It is true that the remote works without that devise only if you are right in front of the television.  The devise is needed if you try to use the remote anywhere else in the room.  You had checked into your room at 2:30 and didn’t report an issue until 10 at night for those reasons and after explaining to you what the devise was and offering you to talk to the cable company we would not refund.  It doesn’t matter as you claim to have not gone to your room you right away or not as for our records it shows you had the room for at least 9 hours before you mentioned the issue.  We offered you a discount for your concerns and we felt that was satisfactory to the issue you had.  We have owned this property for many years and have never had an issue like this before.  I assure you that you were explained in detail in many different ways and that we did our utmost professional job to satisfy you and to make you comfortable.

Summary: As a Choice Hotel member, we usually stay at Comfort Suites while on our vacations. Our stay couldn't have been better. Our flight got in very early, and we arrived at the hotel around 11am. They put us in a room immediately, and we took showers and went to DisneyLand. Breakfast was the same both days, but it was fine. "Pancake" eggs, bacon, "make your own" waffles, cereal, boiled eggs, orange juice, apple juice, milk, coffee, danish, doughnuts, and several other things. Used the internet computer room, that was convienent. Room was nice, and smelled good. Property seemed safe, and staff was friendly. Walked across the street to Del Taco for a cheap taco. If you use the ART transportation to Disney, make sure you get a ticket before you get on the bus. We got on the bus, and the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your recent stay with us.  We appreciate when guests tell us about their experiences at the hotel. The feedback really helps us to continue to work hard and to keep our guests happy.  I am glad to hear that you were very happy and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Dont let the outside fool you...GREAT HOTEL!
Summary: Very clean, friendly staff, this was a very nice hotel definetely excedded my expectations of a Comfort Inn. I will make sure to stay their when I go back to the area. Very very nice hotel!!!!! Hotel is also VERY close to Disneyland...perfect location to stay at when going to disney with the family.
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest, Thank you for taking time to comment on your recent stay with us.  Our hotel is located in a great spot that puts us in the middle of all the surrounding events.  I am pleased that you found the hotel to be better then what you had thought and that we are doing a great job on insuring guests happiness.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Value for Our Family Vacation
Summary: We were very pleased with our stay here at the Comfort Inn at 300 E Katella.  Perfect location for us. Clean and comfortable. Fridge and microwave came in handy, helpful and useful. Prestine bathroom for an awesome bathing after a long days adventure and the beds!  Whoa and wow what comfort because each night we stayed we went out like a light once our heads hit those pillows.  No disappointment/s.
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest,  Thank you for your stay with us and your comments about your stay.  I am glad to hear that the hotel meant with all your needs and that you slept well.  We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: It's refreshing to deal with a staff that cares and treats you well.  I travel a lot and would recommend staying here.  Great price and kind staff.  Thanks Comfort Inn!!  I also like the way they resolved a billing problem I had.  Very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking time out to go online and comment about your recent stay with us.  Whatever the issue is I am glad the staff was able to fix it for you and the rest of your stay was pleasant.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: My husband and I went to California for our 2 year anniversary trip. We really wanted to spend our money on the fun parts of our trip, rather than on our hotel room that we knew we would barely be in, so we went with the Comfort Inn. Based off of the other reviews, I asked that we have a room on the opposite side of the highway when we booked our stay. We arrived a couple hours earlier than the check in time, but they were still able to get us into a room right away (on the correct side of the building, I might add.) The room, though not overly impressive was just what we needed, clean and smoke free. The only down side to our room was that the air conditioner made quite a bit of noise (not a problem for us as my husband and I always have to sleep with noise anyway) but possibly
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is my 3rd stay at Comfort Inn and Suites and I just love coming back.  Its a bit dated as far as the decor is concerned but its clean and comfortable and within walking distance to Disneyland.  Breakfast is included in the price and the staff have always been courteous and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking time out to comment about your recent stay with us.  I am glad to hear that it was enjoyable and meant your needs.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: stayed at this hotel for three days. the room was clean, the beds were comfortable, staff was great. it is in walking distance to many things. the free breakfast was was also good. would definately stay hereh again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your comments about your recent stay with us.  I am glad to hear that you liked the stay, the food and the cleanness of the rooms.  We will be on the outlook for you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great Stay, Great Price, Close to Walt Disney Land
Summary: I am a frequent traveler for work and stay in hotels 1-2 times per month, sometimes more, sometimes less.  I have stayed in much more expensive hotels than the Comfort Inn & Suites Anaheim, and have had rooms that were not as nice as the room I had at this hotel.  The cleanliness of this room was EXCELLENT.  The furnishings were simple, clean and in good shape.  Nothing overly fancy, but, everything was clean and in good working order.  The bed and linens were comfortable and clean; the bathroom was clean and well stocked and the breakfast was free and substantial.  We walked to Walt Disney Land in less than 20 minutes.  There's an excellent fast food place across the street that is inexpensive and has quality food.  We were headed to the Port of LA, and it was a simple shuttle
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for taking time out to comment on your recent stay with us.  We appreciate when guest’s notice our hard work.  I am so pleased to hear that we met all of your expectations and even more.   We look forward to serving you and your friends and families needs in the near future.

Summary: We moved to this hotel after spending 3 nights at the Anaheim Hilton, attending a conference. Although the furnishings in this hotel were outdated, I preferred our room to the Hilton which is a typical conference hotel. Our room was spacious and equipped with a fridge, microwave and a magnifying mirror in the bathroom... this was missing in the 4 previous hotels we'd stayed in on this trip. Parking is free plus complimentary breakfast. All in all... good value for the money. The hotel is right next to an on ramp to the I-5, and our first night we were in a room facing the freeway which was very noisy. The next morning we asked the staff in reception if it was possible to move to a quieter part of the hotel which they arranged for us. All staff in this hotel were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for commenting about your stay with us and giving us good reviews.  I am glad to hear that you found our property to be up there with the Hilton.  I am pleased that your stay was pleasant  and we met all of your  needs.  We look forward to seeing you and your family soon.

Summary: This was our 5th time to stay at this hotel and we still love it!! The rooms are spacious, clean & quiet. Also included is a fridge & microwave. Great location near the Anaheim Garden Walk (restaurants & shopping) other great places to dine and shop and of course the Disney parking lots. The complimentary breakfast included "make your own waffles", eggs, sausage, breads & muffins for toasting, assorted pastries, fruit, cereal, yogurt & boiled eggs. We have always been very satisfied with the breakfast selections and also the coffee (both regular and decaf) that is always available. The front desk staff and housekeeping staff are courteous and very helpful. The parking is plentiful and free. Can't say enough about how great this hotel is. Looking forward to staying there
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest, Thank you for taking time to comment on your recent stay with us.  I am excited to hear that we make your stay great and that you keep coming back.  We try hard to ensure our guests have a wonderful stay with us and want to come back.  I am glad that is your case.  Have a wonderful day and we look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: The counter clerks were friendly and helpful. Our room was wonderful, clean spacious, comfortable and had a great view of Angels Stadium, so we got to see the fireworks after the game. The breakfast buffet was great. Great location from baseball, train station, and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your comment and I am glad to hear that your stay was great considering it was your first time.  Our hotel is in a great spot, making it easy to get around without going too far. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and like many people our view was of the freeway entrance. I didn't really hear the freeway because the A/C is super loud. Luckily I can sleep through that but I imagine it would bother people. The room was clean and for the price I cannot complain. There was a fridge and a microwave which would come in handy too.  The breakfast was actually quite terrible and I am not a picky eater. I guess it would be good if you just ate the cereal and donuts, but everything else was not that good. There was yogurt one day and that was the best thing I had.   The front desk staff was okay. Not entirely pleasant, but not entirely terrible. They did give me the wrong bill when I checked out which wasn't a big deal since they charged the correct amount. Also regarding
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for bringing these items to our attention.  We want our guest to feel comfortable while they stay with us.  We have taken care of the issue.  I do hope that you will consider us again and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Spent 2 nights here in late July 2012.  We had a 2nd floor  corner room which was right next to the entrance to I-5.  Traffic noise was a constant throughout the day and night. The free breakfast was a little below what I normally see at Comfort Inn's.  There was no yogurt and a limited selection of other items.  The positives for this hotel are it's location and value.  The Anaheim Garden Walk, a shopping and dinning mall, is within walking distance ~ 3 blocks.  It is more of a hike to Disneyland, but you can purchase a bus pass for that trip.  This is a good hotel if you plan to spend your entire day at Disneyland however, a light sleeper may find the traffic noise a little much.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your comment about your recent stay with us.  I can see that you had a few issues.  Some find that side to be quite pleasant while others may not.  However there is a choice.  We have updated our breakfast and have found no other complaints.  I am not sure if you brought it to the staff’s attention but we have made sure it doesn’t happen again.  I do hope that you will consider us again as for our location and price is unbeatable.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: From our check-in to check-out, the staff were very friendly and helpful, (although they did not have the correct info on the shuttle bus.)  Breakfast was very comprehensive and although the layout caused some delays in accommodating the busiest times, the choices were sufficient and the quality fine.  The room was a good size for a family of four, and comfortable and clean.    Pros -- Value, pool and proximity to Disneyland.  ART Shuttle 12 stopped outside the hotel and a 3-day bus pass cost ~$10.  Also an easy 20-30 minute walk; less to the restaurant areas.  Cons -- The air conditioner was very loud and made it difficult to sleep.  We used a portable white noise machine and just left the fan on (without engaging the compressor) all night.  This made it mostly bearable.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We appreciate you taking time out to comment about us on line.  From what I read I can see that you had a pleasant stay besides the a/c.  We are working on remedying the situation. Thanks for the boost up.  We look forward to serving you future lodging needs.

Summary: lets start with location- you cant walk to Disney theme parks from the hotel, so you'll end up taking your car or use public transportation- given this fact you can take a hotel that is a bit more far away and provides better value for your money.   ahh- and room is just on the freeway....  We had an incident there, the fridge was not working, all our food was lost and thrown away they promised that the manager will contact us but they did not, and when we checked out and told them about this incident they did nothing. This is the kind of things that you just don't do.  moreover- stuff  in general is not nice and not polite.   room was big and generally comfortable and clean though... AC is a bit noisy.   they give you a discount if you but the Disney tickets through them...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your comment on your recent stay with us. I like to explain about the food.  You brought it to our attention and as soon as we heard about the fridge we had the maintenance man take care of it.   The food in question was tomatoes, cucumbers, and a 4th of milk which was still fresh.  Our staff took pictures and if you would like we can send it your email.  Thank you so much for your comment and advice to other guests.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Good clean hotel in a good location
Summary: Stayed here for 10 nights from 26th July until 6th August 2012. Rooms clean with decent amenities including flat screen TV, fridge (with small freezer compartment), microwave, iron and ironing board, hair dryer and coffee making facilities. Our room was on the 4th floor overlooking the freeway - noise was no issue, especially when the air con was switched on. Staff at front desk were pleasant. Breakfast served from 6:30 until 9:30 every day - choices include: cereals, donughts, pastries, toast, muffins, waffles, sausage, egg, yogurts etc - it is the same every day. Very good that there is free parking available. Didn't use the pool although the pool area looked pleasant  10 minute walk from hotel to Garden walk: bars, restaurants and shops on route to Disney A further 10 minute
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, I appreciate you taking the time out to comment on your recent stay with us.  As long as you were with us I am glad to hear that your stay with us was pleasant. Even though the breakfast may seem mundane I hope that you found it pleasantly tasteful.  We look forward to serving you and your families future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disney
Summary: We stayed here for two nights and the rooms were clean and comfortable. Convenient location to Disneyland. There is an ART stop right around the corner which worked well for us to take to Disney. Several places to eat within walking distance. Staff was nice. My daughter is scared of elevators and the front desk staff was quick to offer to unlock the stairwell for us to walk up to our room. We had a great stay. Breakfast was good and wasn't crowded when we were down there. Plenty of protein and fruit along with carbs. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for commenting on our property and I am so glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay.  We have improved the breakfast and thanks for enjoying it.  I am glad to hear that the staff was able to help you.  We appreciate your comments and we look forward to serving your future lodging needs soon.

Summary: First the bad...breakfast is awful and overcrowded.  Everything else is exactly what we were looking for....a room to sleep in for 6 hours a night.  We spent 4 nights here, Three 16 hour days at Disneyland Resort...no point in breaking the bank.  Beds are comfortable, and lots of channels to choose from on TV.  Just skip the breakfast...bring your own, good size refrigerator in room and 2 convenience stores in walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking time to comment on your stay with us.  At times breakfast can be busy which is why we have it open for 3hrs daily.  Even after that I am glad to hear that you did have an enjoyable stay with us. We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Clean and good value near Disney
Summary: I agree with many of the positive reviews. The property is clean, at an ART stop for first-one on and on return, first-one off service. The rooms are adequate, breakfast good and generally enough seating. Staff is attentive and plentiful. Walking distance to convenience stores for snacks and strong coffee is a plus. Room noise wasn't an issue for us. We walked to Disney one day and it took us 25 minutes (with 8 and 5 year old in tow). Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your comments and we really appreciate you letting us know how we are doing.  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and that would come back.  We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: We had a great time July 15-20 at the Comfort Inn on Katella.  Got a great rate on their web site, half of the price of hotels just a little closer to the parks.  Checking was very fast and  then up to our nice room. Everything was neat and clean, no problems here at all.  We had a room facing the freeway on ramp but that was no problem, just hit the switch on the AC to run the fan constantly and adjust the temperature, could barely tell the was a freeway outside of the window.  Breakfast was good, we made sausage and egg sandwiches and the kids loved the doughnuts.  Staff was very nice and friendly, checkout a piece of cake.  I will definitely be back here in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for taking time to comment on our property and that you would definitely come back.  I am so glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Although off the typical Disneyland strip, this hotel was perfect for my stay. It was quiet and clean - what I like. Plus, with using the ART for transportation, the #12 stop was right outside the hotel. The breakfast was plentiful. If I could find anything wrong, I would say the pool was a little warm...on a hot day, it would have felt better a little colder, but that would be my only negative thought and it's a pretty minor one. I would definitely stay here again...great value, they sell Disneyland park hopper tickets at a discount and they sell ART tickets also...can't be beat!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for your comments and letting us know about the pool.  We took care of the pool. Other than this, I am glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Nice place and close to Disneyland.
Summary: A nice place. We had a room on the fifth floor away from the elevator. Our room was always cleaned up in a timely fashion, and breakfast in the morning was well maintained and very good. The proximity to Disneyland was good, although getting in and out of the hotel parking lot takes a little planning. Our room was on the west side of the building, so I cannot comment about the highway noise that some people experienced on the east side next to the highway. I would recommend this place to family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We really appreciate your comments and we are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay.  We are glad to hear that not only would you come back but you would recommend your family and friends to come and stay with us as well.  We will keep an eye for you and them.

Summary: It is by far the best comfort inn we ever stayed.  - Great location, just 2/3 blocks away from disney themepark parking. Also closest hotel to I5 ramp. - Huge room with lots of furnitures, microwave, fridge, plasma tv.  - Nice choice of breakfast.  - Huge parking lot. Never experienced the fear of lack of parking space while returning late night from disney. :) - Restaurants nearby. Some are open till late night.  - Also saw a vending machine with cup-noodles available. Can be very useful for a quick dinner before crashing after a long "walking" day at disney.   Overall, I am quite impressed and would come back here if get a chance.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We are so happy to find that your total experience was wonderful. Breakfast was great and parking was easy.  We strive to ensure each and every guest is going home with a smile.  Thank you and we look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: We cancelled our reservation at another hotel and booked here based on the reviews we saw here. Unfortunately, after staying here for a night, I cannot share the same opinion.  I am actually in the hotel as I am writing this review. The room we were assigned is right next to a busy freeway. It is so noisy that we could not sleep at night. The rooms are old and very small for their price. When I asked to change the room, I was told that rooms on the other side are more expensive.   I, however, do acknowledge the fact that they provide free breakfast and parking which is not very common with hotels in this area.  I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your comment.  However most people find that side of the freeway to be as pleasant as the other side unless on the occasion we have people who are extra sensitive to noise.  As for the other side we advertise on sites that we offer two different prices depending on the side you want. I am glad that it did work out for you and we look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: The hotel itself is very clean, the staff is friendly, and the rooms are comfortable. The location is a few blocks from Disneyland, so unless you feel like walking an extra mile, there is a shuttle available at a reasonable price. The shuttle stops at other hotels so you could be waiting a while to get to the park. We didn't experience any issues with our room, but every morning when we came down for breakfast it was so picked over we had no chance to even get into the corner where the breakfast was because of the traffic. So we opted out of the breakfast every day and just got something simple at the corner market. Over all, we enjoyed our stay, and would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. However, we do offer breakfast from 6:30 to 9:30 so that gives our guests a chance to enjoy it.  We look to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Terrific value, service, and location for this pricey area
Summary: This proved to be much better than expected.  The location was very quiet, though it seems by the map to be by the freeway.  The service was excellent, both at the desk and daily cleaning.  Our sheets were changed, not always the case in multi-stays, and they were very soft.    Unexpected was the ease of walk to restaurants and the convention center.  The pool and spa were well-maintained and very private in the back, with tables and recliners for family relaxing.  Not your usual motel pool at all.    The only negative was the typical bland breakfast of cereal, egg patties, sweet rolls, etc.  Yet, there was a large supply of fruit, the waffle iron was very popular, and the house coffee was suprisingly tasty.  (We always bring our own and make in the room.)
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest, Thank you for your comments and I am so glad to hear that your stay with us was much better than expected. I am happy to hear you enjoyed it and we look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: Very clean. Quiet. Very safe. Polite and courteous staff. Family oriented. Refrigerator and microwave in room. Free Wi-Fi. (For VPN connection, I had to request firewall configuration change from help desk - - telephone # to call in room. Polite service from an independent service provider.) Good shower. Free all you can eat breakfast (cereal, fruits, waffle, eggs, toast, muffins, danish, donuts, meat patties, coffee, orange juice). Free Wall Street Journal, Mon-Fri. Good 15-minute brisk walk to convention center. Walking distance to good restaurants. Exercise room. (Did not use). A small business room for those who do not carry a laptop with them.). Tip is NOT expected at any point. (I did tip, but I worried if I was offending by tipping.) Staff and patrons from diverse
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for taking time out and commenting on our property.  I am so glad to hear that it was a wonderful stay and that as you come back each time it gets better.  We look forward to see you again soon.

Summary: I chose this for the location and value while on a business trip. Large room, comfortable bed, powerful shower. Front desk service is friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, I am glad to hear that your stay we us was great. We look for ward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: We found thia property ideal for our family time at Disney.  Great staff, great value!  The rooms are large and very clean.  Nice pool and spa area.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your comments and I am glad that you had a wonderful stay.  We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: My family really enjoyed our stay at this lovely resort. It's very clean, quiet, non-smoking, centrally loacated and has exceptional staff providing excellent service. It is a hidden gem and such a deal for the accomidations you receive. We will most certainly stay at this fine establishment in the future and refer our friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, I am so glad to hear that your stay with us was wonderful and that you would certainly return.  We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Heated pool, clean facilities, fine for Disneyland
Summary: Fine for walking to Disneyland. The heated pool was great. Typical breakfast choices - always plentiful. Lots of restaurants just across the street (Garden Walk).
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for noticing that our location is close to Disneyland as well as shopping.  I am happy to hear you liked the breakfast.  I am glad that you had an enjoyable experience and we look forward to serving our future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel for your Disneyland Vacation
Summary: My family and I visit Disneyland quite frequently since we are annual pass holders. We have stayed at several different hotels near Disneyland. This was our first time staying here and I was quite impressed with the hotel. This hotel is an excellent value!!! We are very picky about where we stay. Our room was very clean, comfortable and quiet. Updated Bathroom and clean. They have a flat screen tv, microwave, and fridge. Free parking and breakfast was a plus! You can even make your own waffles. Very yummy! We will be coming back here for sure next time!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, I am so glad that you stayed with us and that you really had an enjoyable experience.  We work very hard on keeping our property clean and comfortable.  Thank you for noticing and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: We  stayed on the memorial day weekend at Comfort Inn . The hotel is conveniently located close to all the attractions in Anaheim ,  This a non-smoking hotel which is an amazing plus believe me. The ART transit picks up from outside the hotel for Disneyland at $4 charge per person daily so no expense on the car or parking fees . The breakfast selection is very good, save some dollars by having a hearty breakfast & packing a bit for the afternoon. The rooms also have a microwave & a refrigerator, make sure to stock it up the day before heading to Disneyland. Late at night when the legs are dead tired, you can heat things up on microwave for dinner . There is also a business center where you can check for any online offers for tickets on  craigslist or use the complimentary Wi-Fi
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for your comments.  We appreciate that our hard work has paid off.  We want our guests to feel as if this is part of their home.  I am so glad that it meant with all your needs and expectations. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Great place close to Angel Stadium
Summary: This totally non-smoking hotel (hooray) was a great location for our recent trip to watch the Blue Jays play the Angels.  We stayed 4 nights in 3 separate rooms.  It is also a short walk from the Garden Walk outdoor mall and Disneyland.  Pool and hot tub were great and not busy, rooms were clean and hotel was quiet - even in our rooms on the freeway side - the traffic noise did not bother us at all and we are used to quiet as we live in the country.  The breakfast provided a wide assortment of options, including cereal, fruit, yogurt, egg "mcmuffins" (needed cheese slices tho), waffles, toast, etc.  Everything you need is nearby.  I would not hesitate to recommend or return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for staying with us and I am glad hear that you had such a wonderful experience.  Our staff works very hard to ensure each and every guest leaves with a smile on their face.  We look forward to seeing you soon and serving all your future lodging needs.

Summary: Bunked in for 3 nites at the Comfort Inn on Katella Apr 13.  Reservations were made 2 months in advance but that didn't matter a whole lot to the front desk staff and management when I checked in that afternoon. They didn't have my room 'type' available nor would they that day.  I was told I could accept what they had or cancel my reservation.  Nice.  I understand that sometimes a room type isn't available, but it was their hapless attitude that really stood out.  Anyway, I took they room they gave me and in the end it turned out ok.  It's an older property that has been upgraded over time.  Nice flat screen with lots of channels, fridge, bed was fine, internet very good, good sized bathroom.  Carpet is showing wear and the shower/tub drained real slowly.  Corner chair and
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest, We strive to make sure each and every guest is accommodated to the best of our abilities. I am sorry to hear that you felt your needs weren’t meant, but the staff tried their best to accommodate you even though we didn’t have rooms available on the floor you wanted.  I see that in the end they were able to resolve your issue and you left happy.  However, in cases where our property is either sold out all together or in a certain room type then all we can assure a guest is that they will have a room for the room type they booked.  We can’t promise nor have we ever promised a guest a certain room in our property.  I understand that you booked in advance but that only guaranteed the very low rate you received and the room type you booked but not room location.  When you reserve a room on line or directly with us and you want the firework side then that is considered an upgrade and it costs $10 more. Our property was renovated a few years back and we are still making changes to help our property in looking fresh and new.  Once again thank you for bringing things to our attention and I hope this helps you and we look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: We stayed here for our vacation , My children loved the breakfast the pool was in the back (privacy) and shuttle for Disneyland available we were the 1st to be picked up and 1st to drop off. Rooms are very clean front desk was always helpfull. And non-smoking. I highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest; We truly appreciate when guests recognize the hard work that we put into making sure each and every guest goes home with a smile and thinking that was the best fun I had in a long time and can’t wait to get back.  That tells us that the next time you plan a trip to the Disney area our property will be your first choice and that makes us happy as well as you.  The staff will be happy to hear that their hard work paid off.  Our cleaning staff will also be happy to hear that all that hard work they put into making sure each room is spotless paid off.  We really appreciate your comments and we look forward to serving yours and your families’ future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Great Price for a Hotel Near Disney Land!
Summary: We went as a family with 2 kids and the Hotel was nice a clean and was near Disneyland.  Very nice staff and a pleasant and safe place for Families to stay!  The Breakfast was amazing!  We really had a blast eatting and filling up for the long day ahead!  You get creal, milk, toast, eggs, hot waffle, fruit & Yogurt.  You will for sure like it at the hotel! Enjoy!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest’ Thank you so much for the comments and the time out of your busy schedule to tell us and others about your recent stay with us.  People do love the fact that we are clean and also that our property is enclosed.  Families love that and it makes them feel saver more at home.  I think that the breakfast is amazing too.  I love the make your own waffles.  It is the perfect start to a long day at Disneyland.  Once again we appreciate your comments and we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: My wife and I found this property one of the BEST hotels we have stayed in while traveling. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They put us in connecting rooms with our daughter and her family, which added to the fun in our trip. The breakfast was well maintained and provided a good breakfast to start the day. The room was clean and comfortable. The bathroom was clean and well maintained. The hotel's general appearance was great.  We highly recommend this property for anyone visiting the Disneyland Resort. There is affordable shuttle service to the resort if there is no rental car.
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest; Our connecting rooms make for a more enjoyable trip for those with bigger families.  It does make a difference.  I must say that our breakfast is wonderful and it does help when there is a bigger group traveling together.  It does its job and really does fill one up before they make their way to Disneyland.  Our cleaning staff does a wonderful job at maintaining the property and keeping the rooms spotless.  The shuttle run by the city is very helpful and convenient, not to mention the price is reasonable.  I thank you for commenting about our property and your stay with us.  We look forward to serving yours and your familie's future lodging needs.

Summary: I chose this hotel due to all the positive reviews.  We had a room on the fifth floor (freeway side) in the rear of the property.  Yes you can hear traffic but we needed the fan on at night to keep the air circulating.  After spending a long day in the park we all slept like logs.  The room had two queen beds and was clean and served our needs.  In our room the microwave and refrigerator had to be turned on by outlet switch under the desk.  I found this somewhat awkard getting on my knees to reach under the desk.  The breakfast was as advertised and our kids filled up on ceral, danish and fruit.  We only had to buy lunch once on our two day visit.  The hotel in my opinion is out of walking range if you have small kids.  The staff says 20 mins to the front gate.  We drove our car
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, I am glad to hear that your stay was a good one.  The breakfast is one of the best and I also enjoy the morning coffee and occasional waffle.  Walking with kids to the park can seem far especially if you think about the fact that you will be walking all day at Disneyland anyways.  We offer a shuttle service that is run by the city and the fee is very reasonable especially if you want to come back and take a rest.  I also read that you did have one issue with the room not being cleaned on time. I am glad to hear that when you brought the issue to the staff’s attention they were able to resolve it right away and by the time you returned the room it had been cleaned.  The staff will be glad to know that they are doing their job well and are being noticed for it.  We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: Nicest for the price near Disneyland
Summary: I travel for business, but I see many families at this hotel.  Many hotels near the park charge a resort fee, which in my opinion is a bogus way to jack up the cost of the room, without disclosing it in the room rate.  This property does not.  It is by the interstate, so if the noise bothers you, ask for a room on the west side.  I have stayed on both sides and I can sleep with the traffic sounds.  This hotel was built as a Hampton Inn, so the furnishings and layout of the room are Hampton.  I like the upgrade.  The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean and comfortable.  The beds are not new, but still comfortable.  Watch other properties in this price range.  Most are crappy and charge a resort fee.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking the time out and commenting on our property.  We are one of the properties in the area that doesn’t charge extra for what really should be included.  We want to make sure the guest to feel as if they are getting their money's worth.  We are located near the interstate however as you have stated we have renovated the hotel recently and our windows on that side are double paned.  Still if you’re from a very quiet area then I recommend the other side and the perk to that is that you can see the fireworks. Because it was a Hampton you’ll find our rooms and bathrooms to be very spacious.   Don’t forget that we include free breakfast and wi-fi for all our guests.  The cleaning staff works really hard to insure that each and every part of the hotel is kept clean and they appreciate you noticing and pointing that out.  The front desk thanks you for noticing them too.  Once again thank you for commenting and thank you for staying with us. We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary Heading: If freeway and traffic noise keep you from sleeping, DO NOT take a room on the east side!
Summary: This would be any of the guest rooms ending in an even number.  Not only do they immediately overlook Interstate 5, but also the corner of an extremely busy city intersection.  For this reason alone, I would never stay here again, if I could not get a room on the west side of the building.  That aside, the rooms were very clean, staff were friendly, and the morning breakfast was decent.  Was disappointed to discover there are no in-room movies.  The trade off to the property being SO CLOSE to the 5 is that on/off freeway access is very easy.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest; Thank you for commenting on our property.  If you are sensitive to noise and need it to be quiet then I agree with sleeping on the other side.  However, our property was remodeled recently and the windows on that side are double- paned.  Besides that your experience at our property turned out to be a pleasant one.  I recommend that when you make a reservation either with us or online make sure that you reserve the room type that is $10 more and that will ensure that you are on the side that you want. Our staff thanks you for noticing their bright smiles and the breakfast it pretty good.  Sorry about the no in room movies but we have cable. Once again thank you for the comments and we look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: Although you have to pay for the shuttle to Disneyland, it ran every 20 minutes and was cheaper than parking at the Disney gigantic parking deck and walking to the gate. We had two rooms, both with queen beds. The bathroom had granite countertops and the crescent shaped shower rod was a pleasant surprise for better access into the tub.The breakfast was as advertised and I was completely satisfied with all aspects of my stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was very happy with the room.  The room was completely dust free, the floors looked clean, and the restroom was very clean.  The chair in the room looked like it had seen better days but it was clean.  The tv was a newer flat screen.  Our room was backed up to the elevators and we never heard any noise.  The bed was very comfy, I would describe it as a "medium" firmness.  In the morning they offer a breakfast of pastries, toast, donuts, cereal, waffles, egg and sausage sandwiches, yogurt, fresh fruit, and juice.  I would definately stay here again!  If you are in this area to visit Disneyland this is very close, but I would plan on driving there because it is too far to walk.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I would like to thank you for commenting on our property.  I am happy to hear that you found it to your liking.  Our house keeping staff will be trilled to know that all their hard work is paying off and that the guests are happy and comfortable.  The beds were changed recently and the rooms were renovated recently as well.  I am glad it was to your liking.  I hope you were able to taste all the things you listed for breakfast and liked them all.  I like the breakfast and find that it does its job.  We can’t wait to see you in the near future.

Summary: We stayed for three nights the last week of February.  Very clean hotel, attractive room with fridge and microwave.  Fourth floor wonderful view of fireworks each night.  We weren't bothered by street noise on the west side of building.  Good breakfast bar but as another reviewer wrote, they run out of some items long before the buffet closes.  I didn't get yogurt one time during the stay.  Don't have an in-house guest laundry but there is a laundromat three doors away.  It would be long walk to Disney but as seniors, we would (and did) drive anyway.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for noticing that we strive very hard to keep the property in the best condition possible. We do our best to make sure that the breakfast is well stocked but at times things can happen and I apologized for you not getting the yogurt.  We don’t offer an in house laundry mat but we offer a laundry service that picks up your laundry in the morning and brings it back by 5 in the evening.  If that doesn’t work for you then yes there is a laundry mat next door in the small shopping center.  Walking to Disneyland can be far for some but we have an alternative which is the shuttle, run by the city and we offer it for a small fee and it is good for the entire day.  Again thank you for taking time out to comment and we look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: We stayed 6 nights at this Comfort Inn and had a fairly good experience. The staff was friendly & courteous and the room was clean & well equipped. The only downside was that it's not very sound proof particularly at night. We could hear traffic noise on one side & guests going down the hall on the other side, (if you are a light sleeper, I recommend ear plugs). We initially had a problem with a lock not working to the adjoining room, we let the staff know on our way out to dinner & they said they would get it taken care of & would not place anyone in the adjoining room until it was fixed (it was vacant at the time -- impressive they would go that extra step). The lock was repaired by the time we returned.  The only other small problem we had is the fridge issue as mentioned by
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, I am sorry for the issue with the door locks but I am very happy to see that the issue was taken care of right away and they even went beyond your expectations. We keep the appliances off to converse energy and sometimes guests want their drinks cold and they turn the fridge up high thinking that their drinks will ge colder faster but you are right keeping the thermostat down low will keep your items from freezing. People love our breakfast and I happened to think it is one of the best in the area.  Walking to the park can be far if you think about how long of a day you will be having at the park.  We do suggest that you take the shuttle and not only does it save time but can also save your feet.  The price isn’t so bad either.  I am glad to hear that your stay was enjoyable and that you would return as well as recommend others to us. We appreciate  your business and look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: We recently stayed here for a 3 night Disney trip. The rooms were spacious and clean. Breakfast was included but long lines because it was a holiday weekend. Probably not as bad on slower days. They ran out of yogurts and sausage  even though  we were down there at 8:45. Breakfast ran til 9:30 and they break it down fast.Plenty of other food including  make your own waffles.Price was reasonable . A little too far to walk for most,maybe a mile to the entrance. Especially after a long day at the park. Staff was friendly but didn't get wakeup calls as arranged. Overall I'd stay here again . Good value.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for commenting on our property.  I agree at times breakfast can be busy. We do however try to make sure each and every guest is able to get enough food and have a place to enjoy it.  The walk to Disneyland can be long for anyone after a long day at the park no matter how close the hotel maybe, so on the up side we offer a shuttle to and from the hotel for a small fee that is good for the entire day.  Thank you for noticing that the staff was helpful and I am sorry to hear you didn’t get your wake up call.  I am sure that next time you will receive it.  We look forward to serving your future lodging needs.

Summary: We spent eight nights at the hotel in February 2012.  We chose the hotel because the price was reasonable, the reviews indicated the place was kept clean, and it was relatively close to Disney.    The hotel was kept extremely clean in the common areas and the guest rooms.  I'm a neat freak and I was quite pleased.  Excellent work by the housekeeping staff.  The continental breakfast was good.  We ate there every morning.  Waffles, egg pucks, sausage pucks, muffins, donuts, bread, etc.  Kept us going past noon every day.  We had a 6 year old and a five month old and we found the walk to Disney quite long, especially after a full 12 hour day of walking in the parks.  A few sketchy properties and residents between the hotel and Disney, but we had no problems at all.  Its a far
Manager Response: I am so glad to hear that you found our property to be exactly what you expected and that it met with your expectations.   Our house keeping will be very pleased to know that all their hard work has paid off.   I happen to think that our breakfast is one of the best in the area.  We really do have a variety of food to choose from.  We offer hot and cold.  If you don’t want to walk or drive to Disneyland we offer a shuttle at a reasonable price that picks you up right behind us and drops you off in front of Disneyland and it is good for the entire day.   Thank you for informing us about the iron and ironing board. We will address it.  I am pleased to hear that you did have a good time with us and would recommend us and even come back and stay with us again.  We want each and every guest to feel at home with us and to leave feeling like they left their home and it will be here waiting for them again. We look forward to serving your future lodging needs soon.

Summary: We found nothing wrong with our stay here. Lovely and friendly staff, lots of variety for breakfast, felt safe, and shuttles to Disneyland. It is a nice big hotel, with lots of people milling around. Great place to stay
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest, Thank you so much for staying with us and letting others know how much you really enjoyed staying with us.  We do our best to ensure that each and every guest leaves us wanting to come back.
